Odocob Jisas uqana malogom maaden, “Dana cehewanca uqa cehewan cofdocnu dana osoca. Odocob age dana cehewanca madoin, ‘Hinana cofdoc dana uqa hina cehewain cusdona,’ doin.
Odocob uqa utadocob leceb madon, ‘Eu cel je ija hinanu dah miga? Hina ija cehewani cofdoc dana haun qee biligaun. Eunu hina ija cehewani adi cofdogona eu jaqimeg itiga,’ don.
Odocob cabi dana eu uqadodocnu maden, ‘Ijana meca ijana cabinadec qee mitigian. Ija eeta odigen? Ija maha hunecnu cabi ocnu gagadic odocca qee. Odocob ija dana ceteh iteiga ec niniadecnu majanica.
Ija eeta odigen eu qila dugina! Ija ijadodocnu danah madigen. Eunu ijana meca ijana cabinadec qee mitigian saen euna ija ijana danah age agena jobonna ehiti loqagan,’ en.
Eunu uqa dana cunug dana cehewanca euna ceteteh suldogina uqanu wadacdutocnu bilegina eu age maadeceb cegulein. Odocob uqa dana oso sisildon, ‘Hina ganic bahic ijana meca wadacdoc utugan?’ don.
Odocob uqa jejeg hewi madon, ‘Mool dram 100 gadac,’ don. Odocob cehewan cofdoc dana eu uqa madon, ‘Hinana meen qaig hahun ihec. Bilimeg mahuc 50 jaqaga,’ don.
Odocob uqa haun oso sisildon, ‘Odocob hina ganic wadacdoc utugan?’ don. Odocob uqa jejeg hewi madon, ‘Wit bek 100 gadac,’ don. Odocob cabi cofdoc dana madon, ‘Hinana meen qaig hahun ihec. Euna 80 jaqaga,’ don.
Dana maha inadec age agedodocnu cabi ocobocobecnu du cuhadogina qa dana fulacdocnadec age agedodocnu cabi maha inadec odocnu qee du cuhadogina. Hibna dana cehewanca uqa uqana cabi dana odi odonnu don. Eunu uqa binan sulen,” aden.
Odimei Jisas madimei maaden, “Odocob ija maadigina, agedodocnu maha ina cehewan me qee euna danah meiga. Eunu cehewan hewecnu saen eu qee meceb age ehadecebil age bileceb catanec jobon euna loqagan.
Oso uqa cehewan nagnag cofdu cuhadona uqa cehewan benben ha cofdu cuhadugian. Odocob oso uqa cehewan nagnag uhuli cofdona uqa cehewan benben ha uhuli cofdugian.
Age maha ina cehewanaga me qee eu qee cofdu cuhadufeig age cehewanaga mele bahic eu adi cofdoqagan?
Odocob age oso cehewan qee cofdu cuhadocobilfi in uqa age cehewanaga eu adigian?” aden.
“Cabi dana oso uqa dana ben lecis alena cabi ocwe qee. Ge, uqa oso sagagduduqa osonu nalug migian. Qeefi, uqa osonu waug nijigian qa oso cewudigian. Odiwe ha age Anutca maha cehewanca alena tibud mumudi osoben cabi u calecnu qee nijel,” aden.
Odocob Farisi age meen qaig gale ben aden eu age Jisasna je eu cunug dah mein. Odocob age Jisasnu udoc je madein.
Odocob Jisas maaden, “Dana ceteh binanca ec cisdogina qa Anut uqa fena eu ceteh bebesacca. Eunu agedodoc age dana amagana meciadegina eu age ititom ec egina qa Anut age wawagana cisdogina eu uqa dona,” aden.
“Mosesna loo jeca, je hahun madec dana agena jaqec jeca bibili hu Wa Joadec Jon uqana saenna Anutna je himec bilen. Eunadec sanan men eu Anutna culnu me je sildiadecnu cali hon. Odocob dana cajaca cunug age euna sundu lecnu odogina.
Sao mahaca eu qee mecnu ihoc nijina, euqa loo je jaqec je nag bahic eu oso qee mecnu ihoc qee nijina,” aden.
Jisas je haun maaden, “Dana oso uqa aideg culdi caja haun oso ona eu dana caja sisi jelec wagalimei uqa aideg wal kobol odudina. Odocob dana oso uqa caja oso gemug culden ona uqaha dana caja sisi jelec wagalimei wal kobol odona,” aden.
Jisas je haun maaden, “Dana oso uqa cehewan gehca biloloi. Uqa lotoc meen qaig benbennadec himec tacoloi. Lotoc eu golca sosologca. Odocob uqa deel cunug uqana bilec eu me bahic. Sab me bahic joloi.
Saen euna sawen dana oso, uqa ijan Lasaras, ha biloloi. Uqa isoh deweg ganacna cunug ihoc len. Uqana sawen danah age ehudi dana cehewanca euna gel cebecna ahocobil biloloi.
Sab susul dana cehewanca eu jiji culeceb jec cabalna tonoloi eu jigiannu ehudi ehitocnu cisdoloi. Odocob qa ageha humeig isoh beluhdoloig.
Odocob hibna sawen dana eu cal meceb ensel gahidu ehi li Ebraham cemenugna mudein. Odocob dana cehewanca euha cal meceb heel cisein.
Uqa deweg dain tebandudu oloqanihna bilen. Odocob uqa mecieceb ti Ebraham onoca bibilen fen eu Lasaras cemenugna bibilen.
Eunu uqa utai madon, ‘O Mei, Ebraham! Ija ja ben inu gisi cagugina! Ijanu waloc heceb Lasaras suldocom ni wa eben mamogna tanumei beilami qududocob daeia,’ don.
Euqa Ebraham madon, ‘Melami, cisdoga, hinana cebac bilec saenna hina ceteteh meme cunug cedem. Odocob Lasaras ceteteh me qee ceden qa qila uqa ene ceelii bilia. Oodon hina ono gisi cacagu biliga.
Odocob leih age enedec ono hinaca egeca leti loqaganfi ihoc qee o leih age onodec ene leti hoqaganfi ageha ihoc qee, eunu maha heel dunuh bagalanca bahic gemo nijia,’ don.
Odocob dana cehewanca madon, ‘O Mei, ono ija waliel 5-pela bileiga. Lasaras culdecem uqa nuimei ulauladec je ija odom eunu maadigian. Eunu ija ninihigina, ageha cudun dewenega dain tebandocna ene cain howainnu Lasaras suldocom ija meina jona leiale,’ don.
<range>
Odocob Ebraham madon, ‘Hina walinel age Mosesna loo jeca, je hahun madec dana agena jaqec jeca ulauladec jenu eu bilia. Hina walinel culadecem age eu dah moqagan,’ don.
Odocob dana cehewanca jejeg hewi madon, ‘O Mei Ebraham, eu himec ihoc qee! Euqa oso uqa cal mecnadec ceseli cajimei eu ageca lifei wawaga meleigian. Odocob agena silailnu tului falicdoqagan,’ don.
Euqa Ebraham madon, ‘Age Mosesna loo jeca, je hahun madec dana agena jaqec jeca maadecebilfi wawaga qee meleel. Eunu dana oso cal mecnadec ceseli cajimei li maadecebfi ha wawaga qee meleeiaun,’ don,” aden.
Odocob Jisas uqa uqana malogom maaden, “Ceteteh dana odadecebil silail megina eu gaid hogina qa dana eu uqa odadeceb age silail meginanu uqa walocca biligian!
Uqa mel sim i eundec oso odudeceb silail migiaqa eu meen culumenca bena qagi macas ameg nijia euna age helecebil wa jimei cal moubmi eu me odoub.
Agedodocnu cofdoiga!” aden. “Hina cotin silail mecebfi cahacdu madoga. Odocob uqana silailnu tului falicdocobfi uqana odoc eunu dahin celeia.
Uqa hinanu silail mi 7-peladumei deel osolna odocob eu saen cunug odi odona hinaca humei mahifei, ‘Ija ijana silailnu tului falicduga,’ hifei hinaha eunu cunug dahin celeia,” aden.
Odocob aposel age Tibud madoin, “Ege cesulgecem egena wawige meleec meca mi dugian,” doin.
Odocob Tibud uqa jejenega hewi maaden, “Age wawaga meleec uqana meca eu aig mastet cinigwefi na sikamoa i madoubmiqa, ‘Hinadodoc cacalimeg bebeig cunugca nui macasna limeg cehaga!’ doubmiqa odocob uqa conoga toodu odoub,” aden.
Jisas je haun maaden, “Age oso uqana cabi dana madocob uqa maha ulam onafo, qee madocob sipsip cofadena eu saen uqa cabi cudunnadec ceseli hocob age madoginafo? ‘Mahuc li sab jaga,’ doginafo?
Qee bahic! Euqa age madogina, ‘Ija wesu sab jec saciadutaga. Odimeg sab cewel ocnu lotoc tacimeg sab qaditecem ija sab wa gabca ji hedocomin hina jegan,’ dogina.
Cabi dana uqa je toodu cabi onanu hetaga doc madoginafo? Qeeo! Qee madogina.
Ageha eu odi himec. Saen age ceteh odoqagannu maadecebil je toodu odimeig madeiga, ‘Ege cabi dana ameg me ocnu ihoc qee nijel. Ege egena cabi mugumige mec himec odom,’ eiga,” aden.
Odocob Jisas uqana jic qaqahi Jerusalem nunui uqa Sameria hatuca, Galili hatuca gemogemo nuen.
Odi nuimei uqa jobon gemo lili cobocob dana 10-pela lepra hagca gulucdoin. Age nag onoca tawein.
Tataweig utai madoin, “O Jisas, Ben! Egenu walol heia!” doin.
Odocob Jisas meciadimei maaden, “Nuimeig nawel tawec ihanec dana age dewenega eu ihacadecebil meciadeiga,” aden. Odocob jic sahu bebelegin agena hag cunug qee men.
Odocob age oso uqana hag me mudeceb fimei utai Anut binan susulei ceseli hon.
Humei uqadodoc Jisas jaihna toni mahulimei hetaga don. Dana eu uqa Sameriadec.
Odocob Jisas maden, “Dana 10-pela agena hagnadec me meiga. Dana 9-pela eu age ana?
Eu eetanu cele dana i uqadih Anut hetaga dugia ceseli hoia?” en.
Odocob Jisas dana eu madon, “Cajimeg nuuga. Hinana wawin meleec eu hag me mudihia,” don.
Odocob Farisi leih age Jisas Anutna cul cel saen hugian ec sisildoin. Odocob Jisas uqa jejenega hewi maaden, “Anutna cul edi hohob qee fowain.
Oso madigian, ‘Feiga, ihec hona!’ igianfo, qee oso madigian, ‘Euhec hona!’ igian eu ihoc qee. Gec feiga, Anutna cul eu age gemo bilia,” aden.
Odimei uqana malogom maaden, “Saen hugian eu saen age Dana Melah uqa mahana cobocna deel oso fecnu hooloqagan qa age deel eu qee fowain.
Leih ha maadoqagan, ‘Feiga, euhec hona!’ adoqagan. Odocob leih maadoqagan, ‘Feiga, ihec hona!’ adoqagan. Euqa amel faleimei sao nahadec naha fulacdu ehi tenawe Dana Melah [uqana deelna] odi camas migian. Eunu age cain tooadi cobowain.
<range>
Euqa casac Dana Melah uqa deweg dain doc ben bahic ugian. Odocob dana cajaca qila bilegina eu age uqa hibemdoqagan.
Noa bilen saenna dana cajaca bileinwe Dana Melah uqana saenna odi ha biluqagan.
Saen euna dana cajaca age sab ji wain ji bibilegin dana caja ocobocobi bibilegin leceb Noa wag benna tobec deelna odi odoin, odocob wa sil cajimei cunug fadaladen.
Eu odiweha Lotna saenna age bileinwe age odi biluqagan. Lotna saenna dana cajaca age sab wainca jiji bibileig ceteteh fafajeig suldodoig sab ceceheig jo ceceheig bilein.
Euqa deel Lot Sodom culaden euna ja meen jan dainca sao jobondec nimei dana cajaca cunug fadaladen.
Eu odiwe Dana Melahna camas mec deelna eu odi caligian,” aden.
“Deel euna dana oso uqa jo tatacan tataweb uqana ceteteh jo dunuh ninijeb uqa toni numei uqana ceteteh cain cedeiaun. Eu odiha dana oso cabina cocobob saen euna uqa haun jona cain ceseleiaun.
Age Lot aidegnu cisdoiga.
Oso uqa uqana cebac bilec sosogon ona eu uqa uqana cebac bilec felacudigian. Oso uqa uqana cebac bilec felacudecebfi eu uqana cebac bilec hewigian.
Ija maadigina, witic euna dana lecis ale cabal osolna us nijuwasan. Oso ehudi beloqagan, oso eu tacewudoqagan.
Caja lecis ale wit meenna ibuldudu biluwasan. Oso ehudi beloqagan, oso tacewudoqagan,” aden. [Dana lecis ale cabina sab cehowasan. Oso ehudi beloqagan, oso tacewudoqagan.]
<range>
Odocob malogom sisildoin, “Tibud, ceteh i ana caligian?” doin. Odocob Jisas galolo je i jejenega hewi maaden, “Dana cal mec deweg ganac huluec oso ninijen man fululec benben cababac cinigwe age euna ceguluqagan,” aden.
Odimei Jisas galolo je i gaid saen cunugna inondoqagannuca, cain dumanaga culiaunnuca iwaladecnu maaden,
“Je gesilec dana oso uqa taun ben osona biloloi. Uqa Anut qee cucuidoloi. Uqa dana cunug mahanadecha cewadoloi.
Odocob caja wij oso uqaha taun eunadih biloloi. Uqa je gesilec dana euca uqa gaid huhuoloi. Uqa gaid inondudu madoloi, ‘Ijana cadnu gesillec saenna cesultaga!’ doloi.
Saen cecelac bahic je gesilec dana uqa cesuldocnu qee cisdoloi qa hibna uqadodoc maden, ‘Ija Anut qee cucuidugina. Dana cunugha cewadigina
qa caja wij i culumen cunug itina eunu ija cesuldugen. Qeefi, uqa odi dih oodob deweni cunug alal doiaundain!’ en,” aden.
Odocob Tibud uqa je tubdu maaden, “Je gesilec dana me qee je maden eu dah meiga.
Eunu Anut uqana dana cajaca nesili cedaden eu agena culumennu cesuladigiannu witic cahinegca qajudegina eu mahuc bahic cesuladena ec age mele dogina. Uqa qee daleeiaun.
Ija maadigina, uqa agena culumennu cesuladigian. Odocob uqa mahuc bahic cesuladigian qa Dana Melah uqa camas mec saenna mahana nimei wawaga meleec gulucdugianfa?” aden.
Odocob Jisas galolo je osoha dana age ija dana ititom bahic ec cisdodoig agedodoc binanaga susuleig dana cunug cewadegina eundec maaden,
“Dana lecis tempelna inondowasannu tesin. Oso uqa Farisi dana. Oso uqa takis cedec dana.
Odocob Farisi uqa cuhanuc tatawi inondudu maden, ‘Dana cunug odogina ija odi qee odigina eunu Anut ija hetaga higina. Age cunug culunuga qanfo, ititom qeefo, age dana oso uqa aideg oginafo eu odi. Ija takis cedec dana i bilina cinigwe qee eunu hetaga higina.
Ija cuha cunugna deel lecis cud biligina. Odocob ija meen qaig cunug ugina eu am 10-pela qatanimig osol hinana cabinu migina,’ don.
Euqa takis cedec dana eu onoca tawimei sao jobon ha ola suli u tatiecwe qee qa uqa muguhna eben foidudu madon, ‘O Anut, ija silail dana! Ijanu walol heia,’ don,” aden.
Odocob Jisas maaden, “Ija maadigina, oso uqa culai ijanel lalan mumudi bilina euqa Anut uqa dana eu cilehdugian. Oso uqadodoc jogoi waug lal qocca bilina eu Anut uqa dana eu culaug u lalan mumudeb biligian. Eunu takis cedec dana iqa uqa mele bahic Anut amegna ititom bibilen jona nuen, oso eu qee,” aden.
Odocob dana caja leih age Jisas uqa eben agena mel sim ilomogana migiannu uqaca ehi lein. Euqa malogom meciadimeig age gagalaadi cahacadein.
Euqa Jisas mel sim utaadeceb uqaca lein. Odocob maaden, “Mel sim eundecnu Anutna cul muden nijiado. Eunu cain cahacadowain. Culadecebil mel sim age ijaca hoigale.
Ija mele maadigina, oso uqa mel sim Anutna cul ona eu odiwe qee ona eu Anutna culna qee leiaun,” aden.
Odocob Juda dana agena ilo oso uqa Jisas sisildon, “O Iwalgec Me, cebac bilec catanec eu mugumi ocnu ija eeta odigen?” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Eetanu ija me taga? Dana cunug me qee. Anut himec uqa me bilina.
Hina Mosesna loo jena eu dogona: ‘Dana dana cajaca dewenela osol mec cain cagualegaun. Oso cain qagadogaun. Oso uqana ceteteh cain heje cedagaun. Oso uqanu uhulec je cain madagaun. Hina anin memenca lalan malagale,’ ena,” don.
Odocob dana eu uqa Jisas madon, “Ija simnadec cocobi Mosesna loo je eu cunug toodu odom,” don.
Saen Jisas eu dah mimei dana eu madon, “Hinana odoc ihoc ligiannu odoc oso qee odolom eu odogale. Hina nuimeg hina cehewain cunug idadumeg meen qaig eunadec umeg dana sawen eundec siwiadagale. Odi odimeg hina sao jobon ono cehewainca bilegan. Odimeg hu ija tootagale,” don.
Euqa dana eu cehewanca bahic eunu uqa je eu dumei waug me qee bahic men.
Odocob Jisas dana eu waug me qee meceb fimei maden, “Kamel lotoc gisec cese gigilona isec li nuecnu cacanigca, euqa dana cehewanca eu Anutna cul dunuh lecnu cacanigca eu wooldoc bahic. Eunu dana cehewanagaca eundec age Anutna cul dunuh loqagannu eu cacanigca bahic!” aden.
<range>
Odocob dana dah mudein eundec sisildoin, “Mele odi nijecebfi oso cahahadocnu eu adi?” doin.
Odocob Jisas jejenega hewi maaden, “Dana age odi odocnu qee nijel. Eu Anut ihoc odigian,” aden.
Odocob Pita madon, “Faga, ege egena jobon culdimeb hina toohi coboqona,” don.
Odocob Jisas maaden, “Ija mele maadigina, oso uqa Anutna culnu jobonfo, aidegfo, waliagulfo, memeg anagfo, talaculfo culina
uqa maha ina bibili ceteteh mecaca ugian. Odocob uqa saen hibna hugian euna cebac bileceb catanec ha ugian,” aden.
Odocob Jisas uqana malogom 12-pela gesacna cedi ehi limei maaden, “Feiga, ege Jerusalem toqona. Age ono Dana Melah Juda dana qee eundec ebenegana muduqagan. Odocobil age uqa lelandumeig je me qee madumeig cin qudoqagan. Odimeig age uqa qisadumeig qocobil cal migian qa deel cijeddocna haun ceseli cajigian. Eunu Jerusalem ono je hahun madec dana age Dana Melahnu je jaqein eu cunug ihoc ligian,” aden.
<range>
<range>
Euqa malogom ceteh eunu agena cisdoc qee fogo dol. Je gug eu cunug eu jahunec bilen. Odocob age Jisas je maden eunu qee doloin.
Odocob Jisas uqa Jeriko taun dodoldodon ameg galuc mec dana oso uqa sabnu cesuldoqagannu niniaadi bilei jic gesacna bilen.
Uqa dana cajaca mati bahic wooldodogin dah mimei sisiladen, “I cel?” aden.
Odocob age madoin, “Jisas Nasaretdec woolhi nuina,” doin.
Odocob uqa utai madon, “Jisas, Dewid Melah, ijanu walol heiale!” don.
Odocob dana cajaca aquni tawein eu age gagaladudu madoin, “Cain utaagaun. Culugale,” doin. Euqa uqa feeaadi co suli u haun utai madon, “O Dewid Melah, ijanu walol heia!” don.
Jisas tului tawimei dana ameg galuc mec eu uqa cemenug ehi loqagannu gagadic maaden. Dana ameg galuc mec eu uqa cemenug hocob Jisas sisildon,
“Ija hina eeta odihigennu cisdogona?” don. Odocob uqa jejeg hewi madon, “O Tibud, ija ceteh fecnu madigina,” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Hina wawin meleec eu me mihia. Meciaga!” don.
Odocob dana eu mahuc bahic ameg fogo docob uqa ceteteh cunug fen. Odimei Anut hetaga dudu Jisas toodon. Dana cajaca eu fimeig age cunug Anut binan sulein.
Odocob Jisas Jeriko taun limei gemogemo nuen.
Ono takis cedec dana agena ilo biloloi. Uqa ijan Sakias. Uqa cehewanca.
Uqa Jisas cel dana adec eu figia oodon qa uqa dana gohic. Eunu dana amha ceguleinnu Jisas fecwe qee.
Eunu uqa aquni guguli nuimei na sikamoa oso Jisas eusec ligian ec dumei figiannu tobon.
Odocob Jisas cudun euna limei mecieceb na ohis teceb Sakias fimei madon, “Sakias ija qila hina naguc nijigen. Eunu mahuc tonoga,” don.
Odocob Sakias mahucwe tonimei waug ceelecca Jisas ehuden.
Odocob cunug fein eundec age gonagona mimeig madein, “Dana i silail danana jona nijoug nijecnu leia!” ein.
Odocob Sakias caji tawimei Tibud madon, “O Tibud, dah maga! Ija cehewani gemo cesawimig naha sawen adigen. Odocob ija oso uhuldomfi eu odi meen qaig eu sanijec 4-peladoc wadacdugen,” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Dana Melah uqa fadaladigiannu bilein eundec waladi cahahaadecnu nen. Eunu dana iha uqa Ebrahamna sihulnadecnu qila Anut uqa dana cajaca age jo ina bilegina eu cahahaadeia,” don.
<range>
Dana eu dah memegin Jisas uqa Jerusalem wele cemenug mumuden age Anutna cul nag odi camas migian ec cisdoinnu uqa tubdu galolo je maaden.
Eunu uqa maaden, “Dana oso uqa ijan benca uqa hatu onoca uqa king caligiannuca, uqa hibna uqana hatu king bilecnu ceseligiannuca nuen.
Uqa culadi nuigia bili uqana cabi dana 10-pela cunugca utaadeceb cegulecebil uqa kina 20 20 cunug filfil aden. Odimei maaden, ‘Age meen qaig ina idadeebil leceb ija isi ceseli humig figen,’ aden.
Odonqa dana age uqana hatunadec age dana ijan bencanu gemanaga beceb sagagdoin. Eunu age sos dana uqa eu agena king bilecnu culadoqa ec madoqaga bili suladecebil hib toodoin,” aden.
“Odocob dana ijan benca king mudecebil ceselen. Odocob uqana cabi dana meen qaig aden eu age meen qaig eunadec agena idadecna meen qaig haun ganic calen eu dugiannu je gagadic maadeceb uqa amegna osolosol lein.
Odocob dana aqunecna tawen eu limei madon, ‘Meca fagale, hina kina 20 item ija meen qaig euna idadecemin kina 200 haun mudem,’ don.
Odocob uqa madon, ‘Hina cabi dana me bahic! Hina cabi oc nag me cofdoga eunu taun ben 10-pela cunugca cofdoc dana mihigen,’ don.
Odocob cabi dana lecisdoc len eu madon, ‘Meca fagale, hina kina 20 item ija meen qaig euna idadecemin kina 100 haun mudem,’ don.
Odocob eu uqa madon, ‘Hina taun ben 5-pela cunugca cofdogan,’ don.
Odocob cabi dana oso eu limei madon, ‘Meca, kina 20 item ihec. Hina dana gemainca bahic eunu ija hinanu cucuiem. Hina ceteh ocnu qee cabi ogona eu ogona. Odimeg ceteh hina qee cehagana eu jagana. Eunu hinana meen qaig eu musul cacoc lotoc nagna ija jahunem,’ don.
<range>
Odocob uqa madon, ‘Hina cabi dana me qee! Hinana je euna gesilihigen. Ija dana gemanica, ija ceteh ocnu qee cabi ugina eu ugina odocob ceteh ija qee cehigina eu jigina ec dogona.
Eunu eetanu ijana meen qaig eu qaig mec jona qee melem? Odocob ija ceseli humig meen qaig nag haun sabijeceb ceseli cedoum,’ don.
Odimei uqa leih ono tawein eu age maaden, ‘Uqana kina 20 cawaldumeig uqana kina 200 nijen uteigale,’ aden.
Odocob eu age madoin, ‘Meca, uqa kina 200 wele oia!’ doin.
Odocob uqa jejenega hewi maaden, ‘Ija maadigina, cunug age cetehca bilegina eu Anut uqa ceteh haun adigian. Euqa oso uqa cetehca qee bilina eu Anut uqa uqana nag nijia eu cawaldugian.
Odocob qila ijana cad i agenu age ija agena king bilec culadein eu ene cedi ahumeig ija olanina qagaadeiga!’ aden,” aden.
Jisas odi maadimei cuculadi uqa aquni Jerusalem ono ten.
Tetei uqa Betfasi Betanica jobon dodolaalei Oliw Aluhna ono malogom lecis sulaleceb aqunimesi
maalen, “Jobon amigena nijia euna lesia. Ale dunuh lelesi cesel goman manahal oso qagec tataweb gulucdowasan. Cesel eu dana oso tatacan qee bilel. Ale eu cufalimesi ehudi ene ahosiale.
Dana oso sisilalecebfi, ‘Eetanu cufalesina?’ alecebfi madowasan, ‘Tibud cesel eu ocnu eu cabi osoca madena,’ dowasan,” alen. Odimei sulaleceb belesin.
Eu ale jic toodu belimesi ceteh cunug Jisas maalen odi gulucdosin.
Ale cesel goman manahal eu cucufalesin uqana cofdoc hu sisilalein, “Eetanu cesel goman manahal eu cufalesina?” alein.
Odocob ale jejenega hewi maadesin, “Tibud uqa cesel eu ocnu eu cabi osoca madena,” adesin.
Odimesi cesel goman manahal eu Jisas ehi litosin. Odocob alena lotoc dool gogodohna mimesi Jisas cesuldodosin tobi gogodohna bilen.
Uqa cesel goman manahal gogodohna bibili nunuen eu age agena lotoc duitotogin eu lalagan nuen.
Odimei uqa Jerusalem cemenug lelen jic Oliw Aluh gololecna ono uqana malogom mati bahic Anut kobolkobol odoc odocob amagana feinnu celeboeeig binan susuli ooig jejenega suli uutai madein:
“King uqa Tibud ijanna hona Anut eeldoiale! Sao jobonna malol biliale! Anut ohis bilina uqa kobolkobolca biliale!” ein.
Oodogin Farisi leih am ben dunuh eunadec Jisas madoin, “Iwalgec, hinana malogom cahacadecem tilieiga!” doin.
Odocob Jisas jejenega hewi maaden, “Ija maadigina, eu age tiliecebilfi meen agedodoc sanan mi utaoqagan!” aden.
Odocob uqa Jerusalem cudun ben eu cemenug bahic mudimei ameg mudeceb leceb fimei uqanu qajen.
Odimei maden, “Hina qila himec cel odimeg malol biligina ec doummi eu me bahic! Euqa hina Anut cahahahigiannu hon saen eunu qee dolom. Eunu qila hina jic malol fecwe qee. Odocob saen caleceb hinana cad maha huhuni talilhuqagan. Odimeig age hinana gelna maha am ben goimdumeig jic muduqagan. Odocob qeih cunugnana ququlubaadi loqagan. Eu age hinana dana gel dunuh bilegina hinaca fadalaadi mahana qeladoqagan. Meen oso ha uqana bilec cudunna qee culdowain,” en.
<range>
<range>
Odocob Jisas tempel dunuh limei dana ono ceteteh suldudu bilein eu sanan mi ititacaadi
maaden, “Anutna je jaqecna je oso nijia eu Anut odi madena: ‘Ijana jo eu Anut inondocnu jo tawigian’ ena. Ageqa agena odocna age falicdocobil heje dana agena jahunec cudun ibuldon!” aden.
Odocob Jisas tempelna deel cunugna iwaladoloi. Ihanec dana benbenca, loo je iwaladec dana ageca, dana caja agena benbenca age qagadoqagannu jic wali coboin.
Euqa dana cajaca cunug age uqa dah mudoloig eu je osol bahic ha wooldocnu culoloig. Eunu age adi bahic odocnu ec jic qee felein.
Odocob deel osona saen Jisas uqa tempelna iwalaadi me je maaaden ihanec dana benbenca, loo je iwaladecca, Juda agena matuca age uqaca humeig
sisildoin, “Magaga, in ijanna hina eu odogona? In cabi eu ocnu maheceb odogona?” doin.
Odocob Jisas jejenega hewi maaden, “Ija age casac je oso sisiladigen. Mateiga,
Jonna wa joadec eu sao jobondecfo, qee danadecfo?” aden.
Odocob age agedodoc togodudu madein, “Ege madoqaqa wa joadec eu sao jobondec doqaqa uqa ege eetanu uqanu wawaga mele qee el? gigian.
Ege madoqaqa wa joadec eu dananadec doqaqa eu dana cajaca eu age cunug Jonnu uqa je hahun madec dana ec wawaga ben bahic meleena. Eunu age meen qeli qigecebil cal meqan,” ein.
Eunu age jejeg hewi madoin, “Jonna wa joadec eu anadec ege qee doqona,” doin.
Odocob Jisas maaden, “Eunu ija ageha in ijanna ceteh i odigina eu qee maadigaun,” aden.
Odimei Jisas galolo je i dana cajaca maaden, “Dana oso wain cabi cehen. Dana leih age uqana wain cabi cofdocnu ebenegana meceb meen qaig mumudegin uqa jobon cuculi nui saen cecelacca bahic bilen.
Wain aig wal meceb cedec saen cali hocob wain cabi gug uqa cabi dana oso suldudu madon, ‘Hina nuimeg wain cabi oc eundec maadecem age wain aig leih eu ihecebil cedi ahutagale,’ don. Euqa dana age wain cabi cofdoin eu age cabi dana qumeig wain aig ameg oso qee utec suldocobil ceselen.
Odocob wain cabi gug uqa haun cabi dana oso suldocob nuen. Euqa wain cabi cofdoin age cabi dana euha qumeig me qee mudimeig suldocobil gauc ceselen.
Odocob wain cabi gug uqa cabi dana cijeddoc eu suldocob nuen qa dana eu age uqaha qetudein. Odimeig wain cabinadec heludecebil calen.
Odocob wain cabi gug maden, ‘Adi odigen? Ija melami nelugca i suldocomin nuigian. Acahna age uqa cumundoqagan,’ en.
Euqa saen dana eu age uqa lelen fimeig madocobmadocobein, ‘I cabi gug huqaneh, uqa isi wain cabi ugian. Cois, uqa muguh eu ege oqannu ege cajimeb qocomun cal mecnu!’ ein.
Eunu age wain cabinadec heludecebil cacalen qagadoin,” aden. Odimei Jisas sisiladen, “Wain cabi gug uqa wain cabi cofdoc dana eu eeta odadigian?
Uqa humei dana eu age fadaladeceb cal moqagan. Odimei wain cabi eu dana filfil adigian,” aden. Saen dana eu odi dah mimeig madein, “Eu odi calecwe qee!” ein.
Odocob Jisas meciadimei sisiladen, “Eu odi calecwe qeefi cel oso eu Anutna jaqec je i gug bahic sildina? ‘Meen oso meen gel cehec memei dana culein eu qila meen jo big gug jo hehdocnu calen.’
Dana cunug meen euna toni qoin eu age qetadi susul faladigian. Odocob meen eu oso toni cilehdocobfi comis ibuldugian,” aden.
Odocob loo je iwaladecca, ihanec dana benbenca age Jisas uqa galolo je i agenu maden ec doin. Eunu age saen euna himec Jisas hewoqaga odoin qa eu age dana cajaca cucuiadeinnu qee hewudelein.
Eunu loo je iwaladec dana, ihanec dana benbenca age saen euna Jisas mecidudu cofdoin. Eu age cijawi coboc dana leih age dana meme cinigwe suladecebil belein. Odimeig Jisas agena sisilecna uhuldumeig aisais hewoqagannu cabi adein. Odocob age ihoc uqa ehudi li gesilec jona mudimeig hatu cofdoc dana ebenna moqagannu cisdoin.
Odocob uhulec dana i age Jisas sisildoin, “Iwalgec, hina iwalgigi madagana eu mele, ege doqona. Hina dana ijan meca ec qee cisdogona qa hina Anutna kobol eunu je mele himec dana cajaca iwaladegana euha doqona.
Ege Sisanu takis helecnu eu tutucfo, qee tutuc qeefo?” doin.
Euqa Jisas agena uhulec je eu fimei maaden,
“Meen qaig oso eu ihacteiga. In hahun eu gaga qoc taweia? In ijanha jaqec taweia?” aden. Odocob age jejeg hewi madoin, “Eu Sisa uqana,” doin.
Eunu Jisas maaden, “Eunu age Sisana ceteteh eu Sisa uteiga. Anut toinan eu Anut uteiga,” aden.
Odocob age je oso cahuldu madeceb euna ono dana cajaca amagana aisais hewi ocwe qee. Euqa age je eu maadeceb dumeig tumatumaimeig uqa jejeg hewecwe qee. Eunu age tiliec bahic bilein.
Odocob Sadjusi dana leih Jisasca hoin. Sadjusi age cal mein eundec ceseli qee cajowain egina. Age Jisas je oso sisildu madoin,
“Iwalgec, Moses uqa loo je gadac i jaqigen, ‘Dana oso uqa waliag cal mimei aideg culdigian qa melca qeefi dana eu uqa waliag cal men euna mel basituwasannu aideg eu ugian,’ odi jaqigen.
Saen osona waliagul 7-pela biloloig. Matu eu caja on. Odocob waliag eu aideg mel qee basec uqa cal men.
Odocob waliag lecisdoc uqa caja eu on. [Uqaha aideg mel qee basec cal men.]
Odocob waliag cijeddoc eu waliagul 7-pela cunugca eu odi odoin. Caja euca mel oso qee basec cal mein.
Hibna bahic caja eu cal men.
Odocob waliagwaliag 7-pela cunug uqa age osolosol agena caja bilen. Eunu cal mec ceseli cajec saenna uqa in aideg biligian?” doin.
Odocob Jisas jejenega hewi maaden, “Dana cajaca cebac bilec maha ina ocobocobegina.
Euqa dana cajaca cal mecnadec ceseli cajimeig cebac bilec cul hibnanu Anut gesiladec bilia euna biluqagan eu age Anut talacul biluqagan, age ensel ihocihoc tawoqagan. Odocob age cal mecnadec ceseli cajoqagan. Age cal mecwe qee. Eunu age ocobocob qee owain.
<range>
Odocob Mosesna je jaqec cal mecnadec haun ceseli cajoqagan eunu camasac bahic ihacadena. Na nag ja cijec uqana je euna jaqec taweia eu Moses uqa Tibudnu odi jaqen: ‘Uqa Ebrahamna Anut, uqa Aisakna Anut, odocob uqa Jekobna Anut,’ en.
Eunu dana cunug age uqa amegna cebac bileginanu Tibud uqa cebac bilegina agena Anut, uqa cal mec agena qee,” aden.
Odocob loo je iwaladec dana leih madoin, “Iwalgec, hinana je jejenega hewec eu me bahic!” doin.
Odocob je oso haun sisildocnu cucuiein.
Odocob Jisas sisiladen, “Age adi madegina, ‘Krais eu uqa Dewid Melah,’ egina?
Ge, Dewid uqadodoc buk Samna jaqen: ‘Anut Tibud uqa ijana Tibud odi madon, “Ijaca hu ebeni meulana isec bibilem
ija odocomin hinana cad cunug hu ninijebil hina jaimna lahacadegan,” don,’ en.
Eu feiga, Dewid uqa Kraisnu madi, uqa ijana Tibud, en, eunu adi uqa Dewid Melah bilina?” aden.
Dana cajaca cunug dah mumudegin Jisas uqana malogom maaden,
“Age loo je iwaladec dananu cofdoiga. Loo je iwaladec age lotoc cecelac tacimeig cocobi nuecnu gale adena. Age ceteteh idadec cudunna age binanaga sulecnu gale adena. Age cuha jona cabal me cudunna bilecnu gale adena. Odimeig age sab ben jec saenna bilec binanca euna bilecnu gale adena.
Eu age caja wij agena jo heje cedegina. Odimeig age dana me bahic meciadecnu saen cecelac bahic inondogina! Dana eundec age agena cahuldocnu ameg ben bahic oqagan,” aden.
Odocob Jisas qaalimei uqa cehewanagaca age meen qaig helecnu tempel bokis meen qaig memegin meciaden.
Odimei uqa caja wij sawen osoha meen qaig nag lecis memen fen.
Odocob uqa maaden, “Dana caja cehewanagaca age cehewanaga bennadec meen qaig heleiga qa caja wij i uqa sawen bahic, uqa uqana ceteh cebac bilecnu meen qaig cunug heleia. Eunu ija mele maadigina, caja wij sawen i uqa meen qaig nag heleia eu cehewanagaca age tempel bokisna meen qaig ben bahic heleiga cunug wooladena,” aden.
<range>
Odocob dana leih age tempel uqana meen soidocca fecnu me bahic, odocob bagol gagaca mudein euha fecnu me bahic eunu mamadegin Jisas maaden,
“Ceteteh i cunug fegina eu saen caleceb meen gel ulugedocob meen oso meen oso tatacanna cilehdoc qee biliaun. Cunug wagalecebil mahana tonoqagan,” aden.
Odocob eu age sisildoin, “Iwalgec, aadeb eu odi caligian? Odocob cel gaga casac camas meceb saen wele dodoldona eu ege docnu ihoc?” doin.
Odocob Jisas maaden, “Matica age ija ijanina mamadi hoqagan, ‘Ija uqa,’ oqagan. Odocob ageha madoqagan, ‘Saen wele hoia,’ oqagan. Euqa cain tooadowain. Eunu oso hu faninadi dado madeceb agena jic ceja qocna lowainnu batut feigale.
Han ben saen falicfuluc eu casac caloqagan. Euqa cit qoc eu mahuc qee toodu hoiaun. Eunu age ceteh eu hona ec dah moqagan saen euna cain cucuiuwain,” aden.
Odocob uqa odi maaden, “Dana hatuhatu age cajimeig cilehdocobcilehdocoboqagan. Odocobil dana sihulsihul age cajimeig cilehdocobcilehdocoboqagan.
Mim benben mahana nigian. Sabnu cahel bilec saen maha filfilna cali hugian. Odocob hag gug filfil mahamaha ihoc ligian. Sao jobondec ono gaga meca caca ceteh filfil cacaleb foqagan eunu ben bahic cucuiuqagan.
Euqa ceteh eu cunug qee calec ninijeb age hewadimeig me qee madoqagan. Age Juda agena cuha jo dunuh um aqimeig gihacdoc jona madoqagan. Age ija ijaninu kingca, hatu cofdocca ehadi li amagana madoqagan.
Saen eu age ijana me je qasali maadecnu saen.
Ijadodoc je adi madoqagan eu conogana migen. Odocob doc meca je madoqagan eu agena cad eundec age je mele qee madegina ec madecwe qee, age jejenega hewi maadecwe qee. Eunu age amagana agedodoc cesuladec je adi madoqagannu cain casac saciadowain.
<range>
Age memegailca, anagailca, walinigailca, agena sihul eundec agena danahca eu age agena cad ebenegana madoqagan. Eu age agenadec leih dewenega tudocobil age cal moqagan.
Age ija ijani hewegina eunu dana cajaca cunug age agenu gemanaga beceb sagagadoqagan.
Euqa age dewenega cunug Anut uqa cahahadugian. Gosiniga osol himecha age ilomoganadec qee fadaleiaun.
Age wawaga gagadic tawoqaganna agena cebac bilec catanec oqagan,” aden.
Jisas je haun maaden, “Saen euna eu ‘Fileec Ameg Oc Saen,’ je cunug Anutna jaqec jena taweia eu aig ihoc ligian. Eunu saen age han dana am Jerusalem alildocobil fifeig age taun ben eu nag odi fadaldoqagan ec ihoc cisdoqagan. Eunu leih Judia hatuna bilegina age busali aluhnana toboigale. Leih Jerusalem dunuh bilegina age taun ben eu culdoigale. Odocob leih cabina cobogina age taun benna cain ceseli belowain.
<range>
<range>
Saen euna caja waugca coboc, caja mel su adegina eundec age walocca bahic biluqagan! Ge, saen euna culumen ben bahic mahana caligian. Odocob Anut olohon dana cajaca i age oqagan.
Leih age han siginna cal moqagan. Odocob leih gihacdoc dana cinigwe hatu cunugna ehadi beloqagan. Odocob Juda dana qee eundec age jaimagana Jerusalem lahacdoqagan odi tatawebil li agena saen ihoc ligian,” aden.
Jisas je haun maaden, “Gaga filfil camna, jagelna, malaqana caligian. Odocob hatunana dana caja cunug jaen ben aqigian. Odocob macas silca qaqahi udududoc eunu cucuiuqagan.
Saona gagadic odoc eu caji leceb hocob qeleloqagan. Eunu dana cajaca age cucuieeig maha ina ceteh caligiannu geh cisdoqagan. Odocob amaga ha waldugian.
Eu odi cali hedocob Dana Melah uqa gagadic odoc kobolkobolca bahic uqa taen osona neneb foqagan.
Aria, ceteteh eu odi sanan mi cacaleb saen euna Anut age cahahaadecnu saen dodoldonanu age caji tawimeig ilomoga suleiga,” aden.
Odimei uqa galolo je oso maaden. Uqa maaden, “Age na dannu cisdoiga. Na cunugnu ha cisdoiga.
Saen age cilonca fegina eu cam saen me bahic caligian dodoldona ec dogina.
Eu odi himec age ceteteh eu odi cacaleb fifeig age Anutna cul wele dodoldona eu doqagan,” aden.
“Ija mele maadigina, sihul i qila bilegina qee cal mi hedoc ninijeb ceteteh eu cunug caligian.
Sao mahaca qee migian euqa ijana je qee qee meiaun,” aden.
Jisas je haun maaden, “Euqa ceteteh maha inadecnu cain cisdowain. Cain ja ben qowain. Cain dalul aqeiaun. Maha ina cebac bilecnu cain jaen aqeiaun. Agedodocnu cofdoiga. Qeefi, Gesilec Deel Ben eu mahuc ageca bolob cinigwe hugian.
Deel eu dana cajaca maha cunugna bilegina ageca caligian.
Saen cunugna saciadoc bileiga. Odocob gaidgaid Anut gagadic odoc adigiannu sisildoiga. Eu odina age ceteh cunug ageca caligian eu ihoc wooldoqagan. Odocob age Dana Melah olana tawoqagan,” aden.
Odocob deel cunugna Jisas dana cajaca tempelna iwaladoloi. Wesuna uqa nui Oliw Aluhna ono us nijoloi.
Odocob dana cajaca cunug qasil wele cajimeig tempelna ono uqana je dah moqagannu uqaca loloig.
Odocob Bred Jisca Qee Sab Jec deel gun, age Pasowa ein, eu dodoldon.
Odocob ihanec dana benbenca loo je iwaladec danaca age dana cajacanu cucuiein. Eunu age Jisas qagadocnu jic oso walein.
Odocob saen euna Seten uqa Judas, age Iskariot doloig, uqa waug dunuh len. Judas uqa malogom 12-pela agenadec oso.
Odimei uqa ihanec dana benbenca, tempel cofdoc han danaca ageca len. Odimei uqa Jisas cel jicna age ebenegana migiannu age gami togodoin.
Age eu dumeig wawaga ceeleceb age je gabandumeig meen qaig utecnu je cagoin.
Judas meen qaig fimei eu agena jenu cois en. Odocobil Judas uqa dana cajaca qee cegulec saenna Jisas dewegnu ob mimei age ebenegana mudigiannu jic walen.
Odocob Bred Jisca Qee Sab Jec deel gun cali hon. Deel euna Juda dana age sipsip nag Pasowa ja qocna joqagannu qagadoloig.
Eu odinu Jisas uqa Pita Jonca odi maali sulalen, “Ale belimesi egena Pasowa ja qoc ege jecnu saciadosia.”
Odocob ale jejeg hewi madosin, “Ele ana saciadocnu gale hena?” dosin.
Odocob uqa jejenela hewi maalen, “Fesia, ale taun benna limesi dana oso halon waca gahidu humei jicna gulucaligian. Ale uqa toodu lesi jo uqa hamol ligian euna toodu lesia.
Odimesi ale dana jo eu gug madosia, ‘Iwalgec maheia, “Jo hamol ija ijana malogom gami Pasowa ja qoc sab jecnu eu ai?” heia,’ dosia.
Odocob hamol ben bahic ohis eu sab jec cabalca, bilec cabal ceteh cunugca ihacaligian. Ale Pasowa ja qoc sab jecnu euna saciadosia,” alen.
Odocob ale belesin. Odimesi ale Jisas maalen odi bahic gulucdosin. Euna ale Pasowa ja qoc sab jecnu saciadosin.
Odocob saen eu caleceb Jisas sab jec cabalna bilen. Odocob aposel ha lecebil uqa gami bilein.
Odimei uqa maaden, “Ija maadigina, ija haun Pasowa ja qoc qee jec li hibna Anutna culna aig qoc saenna ihoc ligian. Eunu ija casac Pasowa ja qoc i age gami jimeb isi ija deweni dain tec gahidugen eunu hooligina,” aden.
<range>
Odimei uqa gabin oso on. Anut hetaga doc je madumei maaden, “Ija maadigina, ija wain aignadec haun qee jec li Anutna cul ihoc ligian. Eunu age eu umeig age agedodoc cesawi jeiga,” aden.
<range>
Odimei bred oso umei Anut hetaga dumei uqana malogom aadi maaden, “I ija deweni ganac [eu ija agenu Anut utigina. Age ijanu cisdoqagannu odi odogina,” aden. Hibna eu ji hedumeig uqa wain gabin euha eu odi himec odimei maaden, “Wain gabin i eu Anutna bal cehec je haun eu ija golanina gabandocob agenu basecdugian,” aden.]
<range>
Odimei Jisas maaden, “Euqa feiga! Dana ija cad ebenegana mitigia odona eu uqa ijaca jec cabal ina biluwa.
Mele bahic, Dana Melah uqa wele Anut jic maden odi toodugian eunu jic eu toodugian qa dana cad ebenegana mudigian uqa walocca biligian,” aden.
Uqa odi maadeceb agedodoc sisildocobsisildocobimeig madein, “In uqa kobol odi odigian?” ein.
Odocob malogom age gemona in uqa ben biligian eunu fee dadanein.
Odocob Jisas maaden, “King maha ina bilegina age agena dana cajaca gagadic odoc ilo bilegina. Odocob age agena ilo dananu egena cesulgec egina.
Euqa age odi cain odowain. Cain bahic. Dana age gemona ben bilina uqa dana milum bahic cinigwe biliale. Odocob agena ilo dana uqa cewel uadec odi cinigwe biliale.
In uqa ben, acahna dana sab jecnu bilina uqafo, qee dana sab qumei ahutona uqafo? Eu dana sab jecnu bilina uqa himec. Euqa ija age gemona agena cewel uadec biliga,” aden.
“Wele age ijaca biloloig temtec ceteh holoi eu qee culti qisactoloig.
Odocob ija Mei cul osonu ilo miten. Eu odiwe age ijana culna ijana sab jec cabalna bibileig sab jejeig wa gab jejeig biluqagannu, odimeig bilec cabal ben kobolkobolcana bilimeig Isrel sihul 12-pela gesiladoqagannu ija ageha cul osonu ilo madigina,” aden.
<range>
Odocob Tibud uqa Pita madon, “Saimon, Saimon! Dah maga! Seten uqa wit cabi oc dana wit me ganacca filiganalecnu fohidonawe odi age temadigiannu cois ec Anutna je wele oia.
Euqa hinana wawin meleec qee toneiaunnu ija hinanu wele inonduga. Odocob saen ijaca falicdumeg hina cabi hijinel gagadic odoc adaga,” don.
Odocob Pita jejeg hewi madon, “O Tibud, ija hinaca cal mecnuca, gihacdoc jona nuecnuca cois wele saciadoc biliga!” don.
Odocob Jisas uqa Pita madon, “Pita, ija mahigina, witic ina mala manahal qee qoc ninijeb hina qee sasac ququ madegan, ‘Uqanu qee dugina,’ i cijeddogan,” don.
Odimei Jisas uqana malogom sisiladen, “Saen age meen qaig tacecca, badomca, jaimaga tacecca qee suladem eu nuimeig cetehca qee coboinfo?” aden. Odocob age jejeg hewi madoin, “Ceteh osol osoca qee eu qee cobolom,” doin.
Odocob Jisas maaden, “Euqa qila in oso uqa meen qaig taceccafo, badomcafo eufi cois ahewigian. Odocob oso uqa han siginca qeefi uqana lotoc ben suldumei oso fajigian.
Eunu ija edi maadigina. Anutna jaqec je oso edi maden: ‘Age uqa loo je wooldoc dana osoben bibilegin meciadein,’ eu mele bahic ijaca hona. Ge, ijanu Anutna jaqec je tawena eu mele bahic ihoc lena,” aden.
Odocob malogom age madoin, “O Tibud faga, han sigin lecis ihec,” doin. Odocob uqa maaden, “Eu ihoc!” aden.
Odimei Jisas uqana kobol toodumei uqa cudun eu cuculdi Oliw Aluhna ten. Uqa gaid odoloi odi odocob uqana malogom hib toodocobil tein.
Cudun euna ti calimeig uqa maaden, “Temadecna qee lowainnu inondoiga,” aden.
Odimei uqa cuculadi dana oso meen qeleceb nui tonena eu odi timei gob cehimei Anut inondon.
Odocob uqa madon, “O Mei, hina gabin i cawalitecnu cisdoc nijecebfi cawalitiga. Euqa ijana cisdoc cain toodogaun, hinana cisdoc toodoga,” don. [
Odocob ensel oso sao jobondec gagadic odoc utigiannu nen.
Odocob Jisas deweg culumen doc tebandumei gagadic bahic Anut inondon. Odimei musul golac gagadic cinigwe mahana toocooi tonen.]
Uqa inondu hedumei caji uqana malogom ageca ceseli non. Odimei wawaga culumen adecna us ninijegin meciaden.
Uqa maaden, “Age eetanu us nijegina? Cajimeig temadecna qee lowainnu inondoiga,” aden.
Uqana malogom je maaaden dana am ben bahic tein. Dana aquneceb tein uqa ijan Judas uqa malogom 12-pela eundec oso. Uqa Jisas cotdugiannu cemenug ten.
Euqa Jisas madon, “Judas, hina cotecna Dana Melah uqana cad amagana camasac mudugunafo?” don.
Saen malogom Jisasca tawein eu age ceteh caligia oodon fimeig sisildoin, “Tibud, egena han siginna cois cadecnufo?” doin.
Odocob malogom oso uqana han siginna ihanec dana ilona cabi dana qelimei dahig meulana isec caguton.
Euqa Jisas maadimei, “Eu odi cain! Kobol eu culeiga!” adimei uqa qududocob dahig me muden.
Odimei Jisas uqa ihanec dana benbenca, tempel cofdoc han danaca, Juda agena matuca age uqa hewoqaga lein eu maaden, “Eetanu age han siginca han galabca heje oc dana cinigwe hewoqagannu hoiga?
Ija ageca tempelna gaidgaid bilolob. Odocob age saen euna ija hewitecnu oso qee odoloin. Euqa qila eu agena gagadic odoc saen. Eu tu uqana gagadic odoc gagadic bahic mena,” aden.
Eu age Jisas hewimeig ihanec dana agena ilona jona ehi lein. Odocob Pita Jisas tabag hehewi tooaden.
Jo eu gel dunuh ja hudein. Odocob Pita leceb leih ja cudun bilein gami bilein.
Odocob cabi mel aid oso ono ja cudun bibilen fimei deei maden, “Dana i ha uqaca bilein!” en.
Euqa Pita uqa qee sasac qu madon, “Caja, ija uqanu qee dugina!” don.
Odocob saen nag gieceb dana oso fecidumei madon, “Hina agenadec oso!” don. Euqa Pita jejeg hewi madon, “Dana, ija qee iel!” don.
Odocob aua osol odi hedocob dana oso gagadic bahic maden, “Dana i uqaha Galilidec. Eunu mele bahic, uqaca bilesin,” en.
Euqa Pita jejeg hewi madon, “Dana, hina eetanu madagana eu ija qee dugina!” don. Saen uqa je mamaden bahic mala manahal qon.
Odocob Tibud qaalimei Pita fen. Odocob Pita Tibud je madonnu cisdon, “Mala manahal qee qoc ninijeb hina qee sasac ququ ijanu qee dogona ec madi cijeddogan,” don.
Odocob Pita jo eu cuculi cali limei ben bahic qajen.
Odocob dana Jisas cofdu tawein eu age cih je madodoig ququein.
Ameg qagimeig sisildoin, “Je hahun magaga doqa! Info qihia?” doin.
Odimeig je qesaldoc geh bahic madoin.
Walag daneceb Juda agena matuca, ihanec dana benbenca, dana loo je iwaladecca cegulein. Odocob Jisas eu agena gesilecnu tamanec euna ehudi ehi lein.
Age madoin, “Hina Anutna Krais eu melefi magaga,” doin. Odocob uqa jejenega hewi maaden, “Ija maadeceminfi ijana jenu wawaga qee meleeiaun.
Odocob ija je oso sisiladeceminfi age jejeni qee hewowain.
Euqa qila nueceb hibna ha Dana Melah Anut gagadic odocca bahic eben meulana isec biligian,” aden.
Eu age cunug madoin, “Hina mele bahic Anut Melah?” doin. Odocob uqa jejenega hewi maaden, “Age madegina eu odi,” aden.
Odocob eu age madein, “Ege je dana i maden qasali magecnu dana leih qee cedoqaun. Egedodoc bahic uqa cona madeceb dah moqa!” ein.
Odocob cunug odi cajimeig Jisas uqa Pailatca ehudi ehi lein.
Odimeig age Pailat amegna um qudec je geh bahic madein, “Dana i egena dana cajaca cunug kobol me qee iwalaaden hewoqa. Uqa takis Sisa cain helowain ec maaden. Odocob uqadodoc madena, ‘Ija Krais, ija king biligen,’ ena,” ein.
Odocob Pailat uqa sisildon, “Juda agena king eu hinafo?” don. Odocob Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “Hina madagana eu odi himec,” don.
Odocob Pailat ihanec dana benbenca dana cajaca gelgel amagana maaden, “Ija dana i dewegna cahuldoc oso qee felem,” aden.
Euqa eu age gagadic mimeig madein, “Dana eu uqa dana cajaca je maadeceb olohonoga ben. Judia hatu cunugna eu odi odon. Uqa Galili hatu ono sanan mimei hu ene calen,” ein.
Odocob Pailat eu odi dah mimei oso sisildon, “Dana i uqa Galilidecfo?” don.
Saen Pailat uqa Jisas eu Herod maha cul cofdonanadec ec dumei uqa Herodca suldon. Saen euna Herod uqaha Jerusalem ono ilo bibili bilen.
Herod uqa Jisas hutan dah men. Odimei saen cecelac bahic figiannu cisdudu bilen. Uqa Jisas kobolkobol odoc oso odocob figiannu cisdon. Eunu uqa Jisas fimei waug ceelen.
Eunu Herod sisilec geh bahic Jisas sisildon qa Jisas uqa jejeg qee hewel.
Odocob ihanec dana benbenca, loo je iwaladec danaca cemenugca timeig uqanu um qudec je madein.
Odocob Herod uqana han danaca age Jisas cih je madodoig ququein. Lotoc gaga me bahic king taqeginawe u taqitumeig suldocobil Pailatca ceselen.
Herod Pailatca ale wele cad bilolosi. Euqa deel euna dih danah mesin.
Odocob Pailat uqa ihanec dana benbenca, iwaladec danaca, dana cajaca maadeceb cegulein.
Odimei maaden, “Age dana i ija amina ehudi ahumeig uqa dana cajaca age Rom agena ilo qee tooadecnu iwaladi cahuldona eiga. Qila ene age amagana ija uqa sisilduga qa age uqana cahuldoc um qu madeiga eu mele bahic oso qee felem.
Herodha uqana cahuldoc oso qee fel. Eunu uqa egeca haun suldocob ceseleia. Dana i uqana cahuldocca qee, gauc cal mecnu ihoc qee.
Eunu ijana han dana oso uqa geh bahic qisadocob ija culdecemin nuigian,” aden. [Odocob kobol oso bilen. Pasowa sab jec saen cunugna Pailat gihacdoc dana osol gihacdoc jonadec besitoloi.]
<range>
Odocob dana cajaca am cunug age utaii madein, “Qagadoga! Barabas gihacdocnadec besitoga!” ein.
Odocob Barabas uqa taun benna ono han tulidumei dana qagadocob gihacdoc jona mudein.
Euqa Pailat Jisas suldocob nuigiannu odon. Odinu uqa dana cajaca am age haun utaadi maaden.
Euqa age haun ceseli utai madoin, “Na babalecna tuitu qoga! Na babalecna tuitu qoga!” doin.
Odocob Pailat maadi cijeddon, “Eetanu? Uqa cel qisol mec odon? Ija uqa cal mecnu ihoc dewegna cahuldoc oso qee felem! Ija gehca bahic qisadumig culdecemin nuigian,” aden.
Euqa eu age jejenega ohisna Jisas na babalecna tuitu qocnu utaii madein. Odocob cit qocna bahic agena utaec aig qon.
Eunu Pailat eu agena je toodu Jisas na babalecna tuitu qocnu cois en.
Odimei eu age dana gihacdocnadec besecnu madein eu besiton. Uqa dana han tulidumei taun benna ono dana oso qagadon. Uqa odimei agena je toodumei Jisas deweg na babalecna tuitu qoqagannu ebenegana men.
Odocob Jisas ehudi belein. Saen eu age bebeli bileig jicna dana oso, ijan Saimon Sairinidec, taun benna ono nunuen ceguldoin. Odimeig cahacdodoig na babalec qatona mitocobil gahidu Jisas toodon.
Odocob dana cajaca am ben bahic Jisas Saimonca tooalein. Dana cajaca am eunadec caja leih age Jisasnu qaqajeig due walocca sisili toodoin.
Odocob Jisas waldumei maaden, “Jerusalem caja, age ijanu cain qajowain qa agedodocnu agena melnu cois qajeiga.
Deel hona euna dana madoqagan, ‘Caja melca qee, mel qee basegina eu age, odocob mel qee su adegina eu age ceeli bileigale!’ oqagan.
Saen euna dana age aluh madoqagan, ‘Toni cilehgaga!’ oqagan. Odimeig aluh gatic madoqagan, ‘Jahulgaga!’ oqagan.
Ge, age saen na cebac tatawen ceteh i edi odoginafi na galaleeb saenna age adi odoqagan?” aden.
Loo je wooldoc dana lecis ha cedali ehi tein eu Jisasca osoben aqoqagannu cedali ehi tein.
Odimeig age cudun, ijan “Ilo Gatic,” ono ti calimeig Jisas dana lecis loo je wooldoc eu aleca na babalec cijedna tuitu aqimeig caqusadecebil caculein. Oso Jisas eben meulana isec na babalecna tuitu qoin, odocob oso eben ansena isec na babalecna tuitu qoin.
Jisas maden, “O Mei, age eeta odogina eu qee dogina. Eunu agena silail cagasiadaga,” en. Odimeig uqana lotoc agedodoc satu udodoig siwi cedein.
Odimei dana cajaca ono tawein mecieegin Juda dana agena ilo eu age Jisasnu lelanec je mamadiein, “Uqa leih cahahaaden. Uqa Anutna Kraisfi uqa uqadodoc cahahadoia!” ein.
Odimeig han dana ha uqanu lelanec je mamadeig uqa cemenug cocobi timeig wain gad qugiannu uutiein.
Odimeig maduduein, “Hina Juda agena kingfi hinadodoc cahahadoga!” ein.
Odocob je i uqa ilona jaqi qoin, “Dana i Juda agena king.”
Odocob loo je wooldoc dana lecis na babalecna tuitu aqalein oso uqa Jisas lelandudu madon, “Hina Anutna Kraisfi hinadodoc cahahadumeg eleha cahahalaga!” don.
Euqa dana oso eu odi dah mimei cahacdudu madon, “Hinana nun qoc eu odiwe ijana nun qoc. Ele dain ben leccaca oqona. Eunu hina Anut qee cucuidogonafo?
Elena cahuldoc ameg owona eu cois qa uqa cahuldoc osoca qee,” don.
Odimei uqa Jisas madon, “Jisas, saen hina king calimeg ijanu cisdogale!” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Ija mele mahigina, qila hina ijaca paradaisna bilewan,” don.
Odocob cam gemo ceheceb cam tu qocob hatu cunug gagatuc menen, ninijen li 3 kilok wesu.
Odocob cam tu lelen jajahulen lotoc ben tempelna hamol gunna caqusec tawoloi eu baladu lecisdon.
Odocob Jisas jejeg suli u utaii madon, “O Mei! Ija doloni hina ebenna migina!” don. Uqa eu odi dih madimei kis umei cal men.
Han 100 cofadec dana eu odi odocob fimei Anut binan sulen. Odimei maden, “Mele bahic, dana i uqa dana ititom bahic!” en.
Odocob dana cajaca ceteh calen eu foqaga cegulein eu age odi fimeig qada qaqajeig mugumuga fohifohidodoig ceselein.
Cunug osolosol Jisasnu doloig eu ageca, caja Galilidec Jisas toodu hoin eu ageca nag onoca qisacdu tataweig ceteh i calen eu fein.
Aria, dana oso, ijan Josef, bilen. Uqa Juda agena jobon nag Arimatiadec. Uqa dana ititom. Uqa Anutna cul hoc saen susumudi bilen. Uqaha Juda agena gesilec tamanec qa uqa agena Jisas qagadocnu je madec odocca eunu cois qee el.
<range>
Uqa Pailat amegna limei Jisas deweg ganac ugiannu sisildon.
Odimei Jisas deweg ganac na babalecnadec hewen toneceb lotoc senenec jeuldeceb ehi nui hatin aluh qeih hunein euna mudein. Heel eu dana oso qee mudec Jisas casac mudein.
Deel eu saciadoc deel odocob Juda agena cuha deel gun sanan migia oodon.
Odocob caja Jisas Galilidec toodoin eu age Josef toodocobil nuimeig Jisas deweg ganac hatinna adi mudein eu fein.
Odimeig age jobon ceseli belimeig mool dedeman meme Jisas deweg ganac joudoqaga bili saciadoin. Juda agena cuha deel gunna age jaen mudecnu loo je cagoc gagadic madena odi odoin.
Cuhana qasil wele bahic caja eu age mool dedeman meme saciadoin eu cedi heheweig heel Jisas deweg ganac mudein ono belein.
Beli calimeig meen heel cebec cufa qoc eu olocdu fil mec ninijen fein.
Euna age dunuh lein qa Jisas Tibud deweg ganac qee felein.
Age dadanii tatawegin dana lecis lotoc senenec seeecca bahic wele cemenega tawesin.
Odocob cucuiecca caja eu age jogoii maha mecidoin. Oodogin dana eu ale maadesin, “Age eetanu cal mec agena cudunna dana cebac bilia eu megegina?
Uqa ene qee nijel. Uqa wele ceseli cajeia. Galili hatu ono bibili maadennu cisdoiga.
‘Dana Melah uqa dana silailca ebenegana mecebil na babalecna tuitu qocobil cal migian. Odocob deel cijeddocna haun ceseli cajigian,’ aden,” adesin.
Odocob caja eu age uqana jenu wawaga fogo don.
Hatin onodec haun ceselimeig malogom 11-pela eu ageca lein. Odocob ceteh amagana fein eu dana cajaca cunug ha maadein.
Caja age eu Maria Magdaladecca, Joana odocob Maria, Jems anag, eu age caja leihca ceteh eunu malogom maadein.
Euqa malogom caja age gad je madegina ec cisdoin. Odimeig agena jenu wawaga qee meleel. [Euqa Pita cajimei guguli Jisas deweg ganac mudein heelna nuen. Uqa jogoimei ceteh oso qee fel qa Jisas deweg ganac jelein lotoc eu himec fen. Odimei uqa adi odon ec waug cacaden ceselen.]
<range>
Deel euna himec eu ale togca odi Emeas jobon belesin, uqana cecelac Jerusalemdec eu 11-pela kilomita eu odi.
Odocob ale ceteh cunug calen eunu togodudu belesin.
Saen ale je mamadesi togodudu bebelesin Jisas uqadodoc cemenela leceb osoben cocobi belein.
Ale fesin qa uqa Jisas ec qee fogo alel.
Odocob Jisas maalen, “Ale eetanu je togodudu belesina?” alen. Eu ale olanala gulucqecca tului tawesin.
Odimesi oso uqa ijan Kliopas sisildon, “Acahna, hina cele dana eundec osoldih uqa ono Jerusalem ceteteh cali hon qila deel leih hedoia eu qee dolfo?” don.
Odocob Jisas sisilalen, “Cel ceteteh?” alen. Odocob eu ale jejeg hewi madosin, “Ceteteh Jisas Nasaretdecnu calen eu. Dana eu uqa je hahun madec dana. Odocob uqa Anutca dana cajaca amagana cabi gagadic uu je gagadic mamadi cobon.
Egena ihanec dana benbenca, cofgec danaca cal migiannu madecebil na babalecna tuitu qoin.
Euqa wele bahic egena wawige madec eu odi tawen eu uqa himec Isrel dana cajaca cahahagigian ec cisdom. Odocob je oso ha eu ceteh calen eunadec hocob qila eu deel cijed hedoian.
Eu himec qee. Caja leih egena amnadec ququlubgeeigan. Eu age cocojagen heelna noigan.
Euqa uqa deweg ganac qee felein. Eu age ceseli bimeig ensel lecis amagana camasac mimesi maadesian eu uqa haun ceseli cajeia ec madeigan.
Egena amnadec leih heelna limeig caja madeigan odi bahic gulucdoigan qa uqa qee felein,” dosin.
Odocob Jisas maalen, “Ale gad! Je hahun madec dana agena jenu wawala meleecnu culumenca!
Anutna Krais uqa dain ben doc i edi uu li uqana kobolkobol ugian ec qee dosinafo?” alen.
Odimei Jisas uqanu Anutna jaqec je cunugna madenanu sildialen, uqa Mosesna loo jena sanan mimei je hahun madec dana agena jaqec je cunug odi maalen.
Eu age wele jobon cacali dana lecis eu ale lowasannu lesin eu dodoldoin. Odocobil Jisas uqa jobon eu cuculdi soeceb nuigiannu odon.
Euqa eu ale cahacdudu madosin, “Cam wele nonon tu hona. Hoga, eleca ene nijuqa,” dosin. Eunu uqa leceb eu ale gami nijein.
Uqa eu aleca sab jec cabalna bilimeig bred umei eeldoc je maden. Odimei uqa bred fenadimei alen.
Amala fogo docob Jisas fesin qa eu ale amalana jausen.
Odocob eu aledodoc togodudu madesin, “Saen jic cuhul je malili Anutna jaqec je sildilelen ele wawile ceeleia!” esin.
Odimesi eu ale mahuc bahic cajimesi Jerusalem ceseli belesin. Ono ale malogom 11-pela leih gami cegulein bibilegin cali lesin.
Cali ono lecebil odi maalein, “Tibud eu mele bahic haun ceseli cajeia! Uqa Saimon amegna camasac meia!” alein.
Odocob dana lecis eu ale jic cuhul cocobosin aleca calennu saadesin. Odocob Tibud bred fenialeceb amala fogo docob fesinnu ha sildiadesin.
Saen eu ale eu odi maaadi tatawesin mahuc bahic Tibud age gemo li tawimei [maaden, “Malol ageca biliale,” aden].
Euqa age cucuiecca qeleleeig eu dol oso foqona ec cisdoin.
Euqa uqa maaden, “Age eetanu geh cisdogina? Age eetanu wawaga dadanec ben bahic?
Ija jaimi ebenica feiga. Odocob fimeig dol age culunugaca tefulunugaca qee. Eunu ija bahic wawaga meleeiale. Euqa ija odica eu feiga. Hewitimeig tebandoiga. Odimeig doqagan,” aden.
[Uqa odi mamadi jaih ebenca ihacaden.] Euha age wawaga qee meleel eu age ceelecca dadanecca tawein eunu uqa sisiladen, “Age ene sab jecnu osocafo?” aden.
<range>
Age cul dool jana golin oc utein.
Eu umei uqa amagana jen.
Odimei maaden, “Ceteteh inu bahic saen ija ageca cocobi bilob maadem. Ceteh cunug ijanu Mosesna loo jena jaqeinca, je hahun madec dana agena jaqecna jaqeinca, odocob Samna jaqeinca eu mele ihoc caligian,” aden.
Odimei uqa Anutna jaqec jenu wawaga fogo dugiannu cisdoc fogo duaden.
Odimei maaden, “Anutna jaqec je edi madena, ‘Anutna Krais eu dain ben doc umei cal mecnadec deel cijeddocna haun ceseli cajigian.
Odocob eu uqa ijanna dana cajaca agena silailnu tului falicdocobil Anut agena silail cagasiadecnu je qasali maadoqagan. Age Jerusalem ene sanan mimei mahamaha cunug ihoc ligiannu age me je qasali maadoqagan,’ ena.
Age eu ceteteh i wele fein eunu qasali maadeiga.
Dah meiga, ceteh oso Memige Anut suldocob ageca nigian ec je hahun maden eu ija sulduadigina. Euqa age ene taun benna sumudi bibilebil gagadic odoc ohisdec ageca nigian,” aden.
Odimei uqa ehadi taun ben eu cuculdi Betani jobon odi nuein, odimei uqa eben suli umei eeladen.
Uqa ono eelaaden [Anut ehudeceb cuculadi sao jobon ten.]
Eu age [gob cehi uqanu cuha fimeig] haun Jerusalem ceelii ceseli belein.
Odocob age saen cunugna tempelna Anut hetaga doc je madoloig.
Wele gug qocna sao mahaca qee ifanecna je eu wele bilen. Je eu uqa Anutca bilen. Je eu Anut ijom.
Gug qocna bahic je eu uqa Anutca bilen.
Je euna dih Anut ceteteh cunug ifanen. Ceteh oso uqaca qee Anut ifanen eu qee bilel.
Je eu uqa cebac bilecnu gug. Cebac bilec eu dananu fulacdoc ileten.
Fulacdoc eu tuna fulacdona. Odocob tu eu fulacdoc cafuli qelecwe qee.
Anut uqa dana oso suldocob hon, ijan eu Jon.
Uqa dana cajaca me je qasali maadecnu hon. Uqa fulacdocnu qasali maadeceb uqa umna fulacdoc eunu wawaga meleigiannu hon.
Dana eu uqadodoc fulacdoc qee, uqa fulacdocnu qasali maadecnu hon.
Fulacdoc mele bahic dana cajaca cunug wawaga fulacadena eu mahana cali hugia odon.
Aria, je eu mahana bilen. Anut uqa je euna maha ifanen qa dana cajaca cunug mahana bilein age uqanu qee doloin.
Uqa uqana gunna cali hon euqa uqana eundec age uqa qee oidelein.
Euqa leih age uqa oidein age uqa ijannu wawaga meleen. Eunu uqa Anutna mel ibuldocnu gagadic odoc aden.
Age Anutna mel cali hoin eu dana gale adecnafo, age dewenega gale docnafo anagail memegail golanagana qee basadelein euqa Anut uqadih odocna cali hoin.
Je eu dana deweg ibuldumei ege gemona jo cehi bilen. Uqa Anut amegna me bilecca mele bilecca am bec. Ege uqana kobolkobol fom. Kobolkobol eu Memige Anut Melah osol uqana, Memige Anut uqa suldocob nen.
Jon uqa uqanu je qasali madi utaen, “Ija qee cali hoc bibiligin uqa wele bilen. Eunu dana inu ija mamadi maadem, ‘Uqa ija hib tooti hona eu ija wooltec,’ adem,” en.
Anut uqa loo je Moses umna igen qa Anut uqa amegna me bilecca mele bilecca eu Jisas Krais umna igen. Eunu uqana Anut amegna me bilec am bec eunadec ege cunug eelgen. Eeldoc me bahic eu filfil igen.
<range>
Dana oso Anut qee fel. Anut Melah osol, eu uqaha Anut, uqa Memige Anut wowogonu bilina, uqa Anutnu mageceb dom.
Jon uqana qasali maadec eu odi. Juda agena ilo dana Jerusalemdec age dana leih ihanec danaca Liwaica suladecebil Jonca li sisildu madoin, “Hina in?” doin.
Odocobil Jon je qee jahunadel qa uqa camasac qasali maaden, “Anutna Krais eu ija qee,” aden.
Odocob age sisildoin, “Odiqa eeta odeia? Hina Ilaijafo?” doin. Odocobil uqa jejenega hewi maaden, “Qeeo, ija Ilaija qee,” aden. Odocob age sisildoin, “Hina je hahun madec dananu ege sumuduquna eufo?” doin. Uqaqa jejenega hewi maaden, “Eu qee,” aden.
Odocob age haun sisildoin, “Odi qeefi hina in bahic magaga. Dana age sulgecebil hoqa eu hinadodocnu cel je magecem ege ageca ceseli li maadecnu madoqona,” doin.
Odocobil Jon jejenega hewi maaden: “Ija jejeg oso uqa wadauna bibili utai maadena, ‘Tibudna jic tutuc mudeiga!’ adena. Eu odi weleca je hahun madec dana Aisaia uqa maden,” aden.
Aria, dana age Jon sisildoin eu Farisi suladecebil hoin.
Odocob age Jon sisildoin, “Hina Anutna Krais qeefi, hina Ilaijaha qeefi, hina je hahun madec dana euha qeefi eetanu dana cajaca wa joadagana?” doin.
Odocob Jon jejenega hewi maaden, “Ija wana wa joadigina qa age gemona dana oso bilia eu age qee dogina.
Eu uqa hib tooti hugian. Ija uqana cabi dana me bahic ihoc qee, ija uqa jaih tacec cufalitocwe qee,” aden.
Ceteteh i cunug Betani jobon Jodan wa naha ono isecna calen. Ono Jon dana cajaca wa jojoaadien.
Deel osona Jon uqa Jisas uqaca hohon fimei maaden, “Feiga, Anutna Sipsip Nag ihen. Uqa dana cajaca cunug mahana bilegina agena silail cagasiadecnu hon.
Dana inu ija wele maadem, ‘Ija qee cali hocna uqa bilen. Eunu dana oso ija hib tooti hona eu ija wooltec,’ adem.
Ijadodoc uqanu bahic qee dolom qa Isrel dana cajaca uqanu doqagannu ija wa jojoaadiem hom,” aden.
Odimei Jon uqa je iha qasali maaden, “Ija Kis Gun cuhudid cinigwe sao jobonnadec ni uqaca bibilen fem.
Ijadodoc uqanu qee dolom qa Anut ija dana cajaca wana wa joadecnu sulteceb hom eu uqa maten, ‘Hina Kis Gun nimei dana osoca bibileb fimeg eu uqa Kis Gunna wa joadigian,’ ten.
Eu oodon femnu dana i uqa Anut Melah eunu wele qasali maadem,” aden.
Deel osona Jon uqa uqana malogom lecis gami tawein.
Tataweig uqa Jisas cocobi nunuen fimei maalen, “Fesia, Anutna Sipsip Nag ihen!” alen.
Odocob malogom lecis eu ale odi maaleceb dosin eunu ale Jisas toodocobil belein.
Bebeleig Jisas qaalimei eu ale toododosin fecialimei sisilalen, “Eeta walesina?” alen. Odocob ale Jisas jejeg hewi madosin, “Rabai, (uqana gug eu ‘Iwaladec’) hina cel jona nijigina?” dosin.
Odocobil maalen, “Belimeb fesiale,” alen. Odocob ale uqaca belimeig uqa bibilen fimesi eu wesu 4 kilok odinu deel eu uqaca bilein.
Dana lecis ale Jon uqa Jisasnu maalen dah mimesi Jisas toodosin eundec oso eu Andru, uqa Saimon Pita waliag.
Odocob uqa Jisas cuculdi limei uqa waliag Saimon gulucdumei madon, “Ege wele Mesaia gulucdoqan,” don. (“Mesaia” uqana gug eu Anutna Krais uqa Anutna dana caja cahahaadecnu wele nesili ehuden.)
Odimei uqa ehudeceb Jisasca hosin. Odocobil Jisas uqa Pita mecidudu madon, “Hina ijain Saimon, Jon melah. Hibna age Kifas hoqagan,” don. (“Kifas” eu Aram jena. Age Grik jena falicdocobilfi eu “Pita.”)
Deel osona Jisas Galili hatu ono nuigia bili caji nuen. Nuimei uqa Filip gulucdumei madon, “Hina ija tootaga!” don.
Filip uqa Betsaidadec, eu Andru Pitaca alena jobondec.
Odocob Filip uqa Nataniel gulucdumei madon, “Moses uqa loo jenaca je hahun madec dana ageca dana oso cali hugiannu jaqein eu ege gulucdoqan. Uqa Jisas Nasaretdec, Josef melah,” don.
Odocob Nataniel sisildon, “Cel ceteh me oso Nasaretdec hugianfo?” don. Odocob Filip madon, “Ono limeu fegan,” don.
Odocob Jisas uqa Nataniel uqaca hohon fimei uqanu maaden, “Feiga, eu dana Isreldec bahic, uhulec oso uqa waugna qee nijel!” aden.
Odocob Nataniel uqa Jisas sisildu madon, “Hina adi ija dumaninu dumeg madagana?” don. Odocob Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “Filip qee li mahec ninijen hina na dan saluna bibilegen mecihem,” don.
Odocob Nataniel uqa Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “O Meca, hina Anut Melah! Hina Isrel agena king!” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Hina na dan saluna bibilegen mecihem ec mahigannu wawin meleenafo? Hina isi ceteh qila fagana eu wooldoc ceteteh caloqagan eu fegan!” don.
Odi madumei maaden, “Ija je mele maadigina, age sao jobon hudec tataweb Anutna ensel age Dana Melahca toni tobi eebil foqagan,” aden.
Tu lecis hedocob Kena jobon Galili hatuna dana oso caja ocobocobecnu agena kobol toodu cegulimeig sab wainca jein. Jisas anag Maria uqaha ono li bilen.
Euha Jisasca uqana malogom gami ono hoqagannu je sulduadecebil ageha hu bilein.
Bibilegin wain jecnu qee meceb Jisas anag uqa madon, “Agena wain qee meia,” don.
Odocob Jisas uqa anag jejeg hewi madon, “Au, hina eetanu odi matagana? Ijana saen eu qee hoc nijia,” don.
Odocob Jisas anag cabi dana maaden, “Uqa cel je maadeceb eu toodu odoigale,” aden.
Aria, ono age wa halon meenna mudec 6-pela mecebil tawoloi. Juda dana dewenega soidocnu kobol Mosesna loo je nijen eu odocnu meen halon tawoloi. Meen halon osolosol age wa 100 lita odi ilanocnu ihoc.
Odocob Jisas cabi dana maaden, “Age meen halon eu wa o daneiga,” aden. Odocob age meen halon wa o danecebil bi am ben.
Odimei maaden, “Qila wa naha wetimeig sab cilec cofdoc ehi li utecebil jeia,” aden.
Age odi odocobil wa eu wain ibuldon eu uqa ji fen. Uqa wain anadec eu qee dol, cabi dana wa wetein eu ageqa doin. Odocob sab cilec cofdoc eu uqa dana caja oc eu utadocob hocob
madon, “Dana cunug age wain me bahic casac adecebil jegina, me eu geh ji hedocobil hibna me bahic qee eu adecebil jegina. Hinaqa me odoga, hina wain me bahic gesac mimeg qila i hewi ahoga!” don.
Eu Jisasna kobolkobol odoc matu eu Kena jobon Galili hatu ono odon. Eu odocna uqa uqana kobolkobol ihacaden. Odocobnu uqana malogom uqanu wawaga meleen.
Eu hedocob Jisasca, anag waliagulca, malogom gami Kapaneam jobon ni belein. Odimeig deel leih ono bilein.
Aria, Juda agena Pasowa Sab Jec Ben Deel cali hugia oodon, Jisas Jerusalem ono ten.
Jisas uqa tempel dunuhna dana age idadeegin gulucaden. Age bulmakauca, sipsipca, cuhudidca fafajegin dana ageha meen qaig wadacwuducdodogin feciaden.
Odimei uqa halu matica cedimei luc cubusimei danaca, sipsipca, bulmakauca, tempelnadec qisaaadi ititacaden. Uqa meen qaig wadacwuducdoc dana agena cabal suli qeleceb agena qaig golodon.
Odimei uqa cuhudid fajec dana maaden, “Meina jo idadec cudun cain muduwain! Ceteteh i cedadi ehi beleiga,” aden.
Jisas uqa odi odocob uqana malogom age Anutna jaqec jena je oso nijia cisdoin eu odi, “Hinana jonu ija deweni ninijec eu ji hedona,” en.
Jisas odi odocob Juda dana age Jisas sisildoin, “Hina odi odocnu nijiafo eu cel kobolkobol odoc ihacgecem feqan?” doin.
Odocob Jisas jejenega hewi maaden, “Age tempel i wagalecebil tonecebfi ija deel cijedna haun cehigen,” aden.
Odocob Juda dana age sisildoin, “Tempel i cehecnu sanan mimeig cabi oogin cabi gel 46 ihoc leceb hedumeig culein. Hina adi deel cijednadih tempel haun cehegan?” doin.
Euqa Jisas tempelnu qee madel, eu uqa dewegnu maden.
Eunu hibna uqa cal mecnadec ceseli cajeceb uqana malogom age Jisasna je inu dahiniga fogo docob age Anutna jaqec jenuca, Jisas je maden eunuca wawaga meleen.
Odocob Jisas uqa Jerusalem ono Pasowa Sab Jec Ben saen bibilen dana matica age uqa kobolkobol oodon fimeig uqa ijannu wawaga meleen.
Euqa Jisas uqa dana cunug dumanaga don. Eunu uqa dana eundecnu deweg qee nijel.
Jisas uqadodoc dana wawaga dunuhna ninijen don. Eunu uqa oso uqa hu dana agena gugnu je mateceb dugen odi madecnu qee nijel.
Ono Juda agena ilo oso ijan Nikodimas bilen. Uqa Farisi am eundec oso.
Dana eu witic osona uqa Jisasca humei madon, “O Meca, hina kobolkobol odogona eu oso odocwe qee, euqa oso Anut uqaca bilecebfi eu odocnu ihoc. Eunu hina iwalgec dana Anut sulheceb hom eu ege doqona,” don.
Odocob Jisas uqa jejeg hewi madon, “Ija je mele mahigina, oso uqa haun qee basudecebfi uqa Anutna cul qee feiaun,” don.
Odocob Nikodimas sisildon, “Dana ben mi hedocob eu adi haun basudigian? Uqa anag waug dunuh leceb haun basudecwe qee!” don.
Odocob Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “Ija je mele mahigina, oso uqa wanaca kisnaca qee basudecebfi uqa Anutna cul dunuh lecwe qee.
Oso dana cajaca gug tatawi basecebil cali hona eu dana deweg cebac ona. Oso Kis baseceb cali hona eu kis cebac ona.
Ija age cunug haun basadecnu ec mahiga eunu cain tumatumaagaun.
Fufu uqa ana isec nuigiannu gale dona eu odi nuina. Hina uqa fulufulueceb tebandogona qa anadec hona, ana nuina hina qee dogona. Dana cunug age kis basadeceb cali hogina euha odi bahic,” don.
Odocob Nikodimas sisildon, “Ceteh i mataga eu adi cali hugian?” don.
Odocob Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “Hina Isrel agena iwaladec osoqa, hina eu qee dogona, eu adi?
Ija je mele mahigina, ege doqona eunu maadoqona, ege fom eunu qasali maadoqona, euqa egena qasali maadec docnu culegina.
Ija ceteh mahanadecnu maadecemin wawaga mele qee el. Ija ceteh saonadecnu maadeceminfi adi wawaga meleigian?
Oso sao jobonna qee ti calel. Dana Melah himec uqa sao jobonnadec toni nen,” don.
“Anut uqa Melah mahana dana agena silailnu gesiladigiannu suldocob qee nel qa mahana dana cahahaadeceb demico biluqagannu suldocob nen. Odocob Anut uqa dana cunug mahana bilegina nalunuga mimei cunug age uqanu wawaga meleigian eu age qee fadalowain qa age cebac bilec catanec eu oqagannu uqa melah osol himec culiaden. Eunu Moses uqa wadauna man sononec ihicon qoc suli u caqusenwe dana cunug age uqanu wawaga meleena eundec age cebac bilec catanec eu oqagannu Dana Melah age odi suli u caqusuqagan,” don.
<range>
<range>
<range>
“Oso uqa Melahnu waug meleena eu uqa gesildoc qee gulucdoiaun. Euqa oso uqa waug qee meleena uqa Anut Melah osol ijannu waug qee meleelnu eu uqa wele gesildoc oc bilina.
Gesiladecnu silig i edi. Fulacdoc mahana wele nen. Dana ageqa age cunug me qee odogina eu age fulacdoc sagagdogina. Odimeig age egena odoc camasac meiaun imeig fulacdocna qee hogina. Eunu agena odoc me qee nijianu fulacdoc eu cewudimeig tuna bilec gawegina.
<range>
Osoqa uqa mele kobol odona eu fulacdocna hona. Eunu Anut cesuldocob uqa Anutna kobol toodu odona eu dana age camasac foqagan,” don.
Saen eu hedocob Jisas uqana malogom gami Judia hatuna belimeig bilein. Ono bibili Jisas dana wa joaden.
Jon uqaha Ainon jobonna wa mati bahic nijeinnu ono dana wa jojoaadi bilen. Ainon eu Salim jobon ono isec nijen. Dana cajaca uqaca liliein, uqa wa jojoaadien. (
Saen euna Jon gihacdoc jona qee mudec bibilen.)
Saen euna Jonna malogom age Juda dana osoca age Juda agena kobolnu age dewenega gegehin mecdainnu wa joc oloig eunu togodudu fee dadanein.
Odimeig age Jonca humeig madoin, “Meca, dana uqa wele, hina Jodan wa gesacna ono isec bibilegan, hinaca hon, hina uqanu je qasali magem eu uqadodoc dana wa joadena. Odocob dana cajaca cunug age uqaca legina!” doin.
Odocob Jon jejenega hewi maaden, “Anut uqa sao jobon bilia uqa dana oso ceteh oso qee utecebfi dana eu ocwe qee.
Ija wele maadem, ija Anutna Krais qee. Anut sulteceb ija uqana aqunitoc hom eu agedodoc ijanu qasali mamadegin doin.
Dana oso uqa caja ocob dana eu uqa caja eu gemug. Dana caja ona eu uqana danah eu tatawi caja gemug je madeceb dah mimei waug ceel bahic ena. Eunu ijaha qila ijana ceeli bilec ihoc lena.
Uqa ijan eu meca caligian. Odocob ija ijani eu mahana tonigian,” aden.
Dana ohisdec nen uqa dana cunug wooladec ohis bilina. Oso mahanadec hon eu mahanadec dana, uqa ceteh mahana nijia eunu je madena. Euqa oso sao jobonnadec nen uqa dana cunug wooladec ohis bilina.
Uqa wele fifi dudu en eunu je qasali maadena euqa dana cajaca cunug age uqana qasali maadec culegina.
Dana eu Anut suldocob nen eu uqa Anutna je madena. Ge, Anut uqana Kis eu ihoc lec utina. Eunu oso uqa ohisdec uqana qasali maadec dah mimei gagadicca hewena eu uqa je sisi mec odi madena, “Anut uqa mele bahic,” ena.
<range>
Memige Anut uqa Melahnu nalug mena, uqana ceteteh cunug uqa ebenna muden nijia.
Oso uqa Anut Melahnu waug meleena eu uqa cebac bilec catanec eu wele on. Oso uqa Anut Melah je madena eu toodu qee odona eu cebac bilec catanec qee feiaun qa Anutna gemag bec eu uqa deweg fagdona.
Saen euna Farisi age Jisas uqa Jon wooldoc dana mati bahic uqana malogom ibuldogina, mati bahic wa joadena ec doin. Euqa Jisas uqadodoc dana qee wa joadel, uqana malogom agedih dana wa joadein. Odocob Tibud uqa je eu dumei Judia hatu culdimei Galili hatu ono ceseli nuen.
<range>
<range>
Aria, uqana jic nuigiannu eu Sameria hatu gemona odi nuen.
Uqa Sameria hatu gemona nuimei uqa taun oso hacna calen, ijan eu Sikar. Sikar isec maha oso nijen, maha eu weleca Jekob uqa melah Josef uqana bahic biligiannu uten.
Ono ha wa hunec oso nijen, eu ijan Jekobna wa hunec. Odocob Jisas uqa jic cobonnu siw muduga docob uqa wa hunecna isec bilen, saen eu cam tutuc cehec tatawen.
Jisasna malogom age sab fajoqagannu taun ono wele belein. Odocobil Sameriadec caja oso wa wetigiannu hocob Jisas madon, “Wa wetitaga jiga,” don.
<range>
Odocob Judaca Sameriaca age sagagdocobdocob bileinnu caja eu madon, “Hina Juda dana, ija Sameriadec, adi wa wetihecnu matagana?” don.
Odocob Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “O caja, hina bagol Anut uqa dana caja adena eu doummiqa, hinaha in maheia, ‘Wa wetitaga jiga,’ heia euha doummiqa hina uqa sisildoum, ‘Wa itiga,’ doum, uqa cebac bilec wa oso iheceb joum,” don.
Odocob caja uqa madon, “Dana Ben, hina wa wetecnu halonca qee. Wa hunec euha dunuh bahic nijia. Hina cebac bilec wa eu anadec ogan?
Ege jajanige Jekob uqa wa hunec i igen. Uqaca, melahulca, uqana bulmakau sipsipca wa i joloig. Hina uqa wooldoc madaganafo?” don.
Odocob Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “Cunug wa i jegina eu age haunhaun wa gab adena.
Osoqa wa ija utecemin jigiaqa eu haun wa gab qee doiaun. Wa ija utecemin jigian eu ibuldumei uqa dunuhna cebac wa eu fifiji bibi nijigian. Wa euha cebac bilec catanec ocnu silig tawigian,” don.
Odocob caja madon, “Dana Ben, ija haun wa gab teiaunnu, ijaha ene humig wa wetigaunnu wa eu ija itecem jiga!” don.
Odocob Jisas uqa caja madon, “Cois, hina limeg gemun madocom ceseli hosiale,” don.
Odocob caja jejeg hewi madon, “Ija gemunica qee,” don. Odocob Jisas madon, “Hina dana 5-pela cedadem. Qila dana osoca bilesina eu hina gemun qee, eu mele madaga. Eunu hina ija gemunica qee tagana eu tutuc madagana,” don.
<range>
Odocob caja jejeg hewi madon, “O Dana Ben, hina je hahun madec dana eu dugina.
Ege memigeil age aluh ene tawena euna Anutnu cuha foloig, odocob age Juda dana madegina, ‘Jerusalem dih eu Anutnu cuha fecnu cudun,’ egina. Eu adi?” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Caja, ijana jenu wawin meleeiale. Saen oso hona, saen euna dana age Memige Anutnu ene aluhna himec qee cuha fowain, odimeig Jerusalem ono himecha qee cuha fowain.
Age Sameria dana cuha fec qa fegina, euqa cuha fegina eu uqana gug qee dogina. Cahahaadec silig eu Judadec cali hona. Eunu ege Juda dana ege cuha foqona, eu uqana gug doqona.
Euqa saen oso hugian, saen euha wele hon nijia, saen ina dana mele cuha fegina age Memige Anutnu Kisnaca mele jenaca cuha foqagan. Dana eundec Memige Anutnu cuha fegina eu uqa gale dona.
Anut uqa kis. Odocob age uqanu cuha fegina eu age kisnaca, mele jenaca cuha fec bahic foqagan,” don.
Odocob caja uqa Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “Mesaia uqa hona, age Krais dogina, eu ija dugina. Uqa humei uqa eu odocnu cunug iwalgigian,” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Dana eunu madagana eu ija. Ija hina mahigina eu uqa ijom,” don.
Odi madodon uqana malogom cali hoin. Odimeig age Jisas caja ica je mamadesin fimeig tumatumaein. Euqa age hina eeta gale hena, eetanu caja ica je madesina oso qee sisildu fel.
Odocob caja eu uqana wa halon wa hunecna culimei ceseli taun limei ono dana maaden,
“Belimeig wa hunecna dana oso feigale, uqa ija ceteh cunug odom eu qasalteia. Uqa Anutna Kraisfa?” aden.
Odocob dana age taun culimeig Jisasca lein.
Lelegin Jisasna malogom age Jisas cesusdudu madoin, “Meca, hina sab jagale!” doin.
Odocob uqa maaden, “Ija sab jec osoca age eunu qee dogina,” aden.
Odocob malogom agedodoc togodudu madein, “Oso hu sab uteceb jeiafo?” ein.
Odocobil Jisas maaden, “Oso sulten uqa madena eu odocnuca, uqana cabi u hedocnuca eu ijana sab jec,” aden.
“Age jagel 4-pela hedocob cabina ceteteh wal meceb cedeqan ec qee madeginafo? Ija maadegina, age didii feiga, cabina ceteteh cedecnu wele wal migia odona!
Oso wele ceteh cehen uqaca, oso wal men eu ceden uqaca osoben wawaga ceeleceb biluqagannu oso uqa cabinadec ceteh wal mec cedimei jo bisna mena eu cabinu ameg ona. Odimei uqa wal men eu cebac bilec catanecna ehi li mudina.
Feiga, ene je oso ihoc lena, je eu ihen, ‘Oso cabi umei ceheceb, oso hu wal meceb cedena,’ je eu ihoc lena.
Ija age ceteh age cabi qee oloin, qee ceheleinca cabi eunadec cedoqagannu suladem. Leih age ono cabi cehein. Ageqa euna limeig agena cabi gagadic odocna cehein euna sab cedeiga,” aden.
Caja uqa Jisasnu qasali maaden, “Uqa ija ceteh cunug ija odom eu qasalten,” aden eunu Sameria taundec dana matica age Jisasnu wawaga meleen.
Eunu Sameriadec age Jisasca humeig ninidudu madoin, “Hina nag egeca biluqale,” doin. Odocobil Jisas uqa deel lecis ageca bilein.
Odocob dana cajaca mati age Jisasna jenu wawaga meleen.
Odimeig caja eu madoin, “Hina je magem eunu himec wawige meleec qee ihoc lel. Egedodoc uqana je dah mom. Uqa dana cajaca cunug mahana bilegina agena cahahaadec eu ege qila doqona,” doin.
Jisas uqadodoc qasali maden, “Je hahun madec dana uqa uqana gug hatuna binanca qee,” en. Eunu uqa deel lecis Sameria gami bilimeig cuculadi Galili hatu ono nui cobon.
<range>
Odocob Galili eundec ageha Jerusalem ono Pasowa Sab Jec Ben Deelna nui bilimeig kobolkobol cunug oodon fein. Eunu uqa Galili hatu ono caleceb uqa feele dumeig ageca bilecnu madoin.
Odocob Jisas uqa haun ceseli Kena jobon Galili hatuna calen. Jobon euna wele uqa madeceb wa eu wain ibuldon. Kapaneam jobon ono kingna cabi dana oso bilen. Uqa melah hag ben umei nijen.
Odocob uqa Jisas Judiadec Galili ene hon ec dumei melah uqa cal migia odonnu uqa Jisasca limei ninidudu madon, “Hina ijaca numeu ija melami me muditagale,” don.
Odocob Jisas uqa jejeg hewi madon, “Age kobolkobol odocca gaga odocca qee fifeig age wawaga qee meleeiaun,” don.
Odocob cabi dana eu Jisas madon, “O Dana Ben, nowale, melami qee cal mec ninijeb ono calowale,” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Nugale, hina melem eu cebac biligian!” don. Dana eu Jisasna je waug meleeceb non.
Uqa jobon nunu jicna uqana cabi dana bebegin gulucadeceb madoin, “Hina melem medoia cebac bilia!” doin.
Odocobil uqa sisiladi maaden, “Cel saenna melami hag medoian?” aden. Odocob age madoin, “Eu cum wesu 1 kilokna uqana hag medoian,” doin.
Age madecebil mel memeg uqa saen euna bahic Jisas maten “Hina melem cebac biligian,” ten ec cisdon. Odimei uqaca uqana eundec cunugca Jisasnu wawaga meleen.
Jisas uqa Judiadec Galili hatu ono limei odon eu kobolkobol odoc lecisdon.
Eu hedocob Juda agena cuha fec deel gun oso cali hugia oodon Jisas uqa Jerusalem ono ten.
Aria, Jerusalem meen gel alildocna jic cebec oso nijen, eu ijan Sipsip Jic Cebec. Euna isec wa fifiji bec gudoc nijina, eu Aram jena Betesda egina. Eu qeihna isec jo hamol 5-pela cehec tawen.
Jo hamol euna dana caja hagca mati ono nijein. Eu age amaga galuc mecca, laleg mecca, dewenega me qee mecca nijein. [Saen esuesu Tibudna ensel oso ni wa mulodon. Wa mulodocob oso cunug wooladi aquni wana toni wa jocob eu hag medoc on. Hag filfil aqen eu meaden. Eunu age cunug wana mulodoc saennu susumudi nijein.]
<range>
Ono dana oso bilen eu hag umei cabi gel 38 ihoc lec gaid hag nijoloi.
Jisas uqa dana eu ninijen fimei uqa hag saen odi cecelacca nijina dumei sisildu madon, “Hina hag mehecnu gale henafo?” don.
Odocob hag dana eu Jisas jejeg hewi madon, “Dana Ben, ija cesultec oso qee bilina. Wa mulodocob ija mahuc tonecwe qee. Tonecnu odocomin oso mahuc hu woolti tonimei wa jona,” don.
Odocob Jisas madon, “Hina cajimeg hinana taeg umeg coboga,” don.
Mahuc bahic dana hag medocob caji uqana taeg umei jic cobon. Aria, deel Jisas uqa me muden eu Juda agena cuha deel.
Euqa Juda dana age dana hag medon eu madoin, “Qila cuha deel, hina eetanu hinana taeg gahidogona? Egena loo je eu odi odocnu cain ec madena,” doin.
Odocobil uqa maaden, “Dana uqa me mitia uqa mateceb ijana taeg umig cobigina,” aden.
Odocob age sisildoin, “Dana eu hinana taeg umeg coboga heia eu in?” doin.
Dana mati bahic cudun euna beleinnu Jisas uqa filec isec nuen. Eunu dana hagca eu in uqa me muden eu qee dol.
Hibna Jisas uqa dana eu tempelna cocobon gulucdumei madon, “Faga, hina hag mehen. Ceteh me qee bahic eu wooldoc hinana hag dewenna hoiaunnu haun silail cain magaun,” don.
Odocob dana eu nuimei Juda dana maaden, “Me miten eu Jisas,” aden.
Odocob Juda dana age Jisas uqa Juda agena cuha deelna eu odonnu aqati toodoin.
Odocob Jisas uqa Juda dana maaden, “Ija Mei gaid cabi oloi, qila ha cabi ona eunu ija ha cabi odi ugina,” aden.
Age madein, “Cuha deelna loo je gadac tefacdon eu himec qee, uqa ha madena, ‘Anut uqa ija Mei,’ ena eunu uqadodoc uqa Anutca ele ihocihoc biluwuna ena,” ein. Odi madecebnu age Jisas qocnu geh cisdoin.
Eunu Jisas uqa Juda dana maaden, “Ija je mele maadigina, Anut Melah uqadodoc dih ceteh oso odocwe qee. Uqa Memige Anut oodon fena eu himec uqa odona. Memige Anut uqa Melahnu nalug mena. Uqa ceteteh cunug uqadodoc odona eu Melah ihacdona. Mele, age fimeig tumatumaoqagannu Memige Anut uqa ceteteh qila fegina eu ceteteh wooladec ihacdugian. Eunu Memige Anut odona eu himec Anut Melah odona.
<range>
Memige Anut uqa cal mein eundec tuliadimei cebac bilec haun adenawe, odi Melah osooso uqadodoc cisdoc toodu cebac bilec haun adena.
Ge, Memige Anut uqa oso qee gesildona qa cunug age Memige Anut ijan saulal mudeginawe age Melah ijan ha odi saulal muduqagannu, uqa Melah gesiladigiannu cabi cunug culiton. Oso Melah saulal qee mudina eu uqa Memige, uqa Melah suldon, euha saulal qee mudina,” aden.
<range>
“Ija je mele maadigina, oso ijana je dugiaqa, sulten eu uqana jenu waug meleigiaqa, eu uqa cebac bilec catanec wele on. Uqa gesildocna qee leiaun qa uqa cal mecnadec cebac bilecnana wele leti len,” aden.
“Ija je mele maadigina, saen hugian, saen eu wele hon bilia. Saen ina cal mein eundec age Anut Melahna jejeg dah moqagan. Dah mimeig eu age cajimeig cebac biluqagan.
Ge, Memige Anut uqadodoc cebac bilec gug bilina. Odiwe ha uqa Melah cebac bilec gug bilec culiton.
Odocob Melah eu uqa Dana Melah eunu Memige Anut uqa Melah madon, ‘Cois, hina dana cunug gesiladecnu hina ebenna migina,’ don.
Age inu cain tumatumaowain. Saen hugian, saen euna cunug age qalqalna nijegina uqa jejeg dah moqagan.
Dumeig age cali hoqagan. Agena me odoc nijina eundec age cebac bilec catanec oqagan, me qee odoc nijina eundec age gesiladec me qee oqagan,” aden.
Jisas je haun maaden, “Ija ijana cisdoc toodu qee odigina qa sulten eu uqana cisdoc toodu odigina. Eunu ija cuhanuc ceteh oso odocwe qee. Memige mateceb dah migina eu toodu dana dewenega je ila mi gesiladigina. Deweneganu je eu madigina eu tutuc,” aden.
“Ijanel ijana gugnu je qasali maadiginafi dana age qasali maadec inu meleecwe qee.
Euqa oso ijana gugnu je qasali maadena. Uqa ijanu je qasali maadena eu mele je ija dugina,” aden.
“Agedodoc wele dana sos leih Jonca suladecebil li sisildocobil uqa ijanu je mele qasali maaden.
Euqa ijana gugnu qasali maadec eu dana osonadec qee. Ijaqa je eu Anut age cahahaadecnu maadigina.
Jon uqa gowoc, eu ileten. Age saen nag odi fulacdoc uqanadec cali hon euna celeboi cobocnu gale aden,” aden.
“Euqa ceteh oso ijana gug camasac mena eu Jon ijana gugnu je qasali maadec wooldona. Eu ijana odoc Memige Anut uqa odi hedocnu maten, odoc eu ija gaid odigina eu uqa sulten eunu camas mena.
Memige Anut ija sulten, uqadodoc ijana gugnu qasali maaden. Age uqa jejeg qee dah melein, uqa deweg ha qee felein.
Age uqa suldocob hon eu maadeceb wawaga qee meleel. Eunu uqana je ha wawagana qee bili cuhadona,” aden.
“Feiga, age Anutna jaqec je euna cebac bilec catanec oqan eginanu sasanijii uqana caun megegina. Euqa Anutna jaqec je eu ijana gugnu qasali madena.
Euqa age cebac bilec catanec eu ocnu cemeni hoqagannu culegina,” aden.
“Ija dana binani sulecnu qee madegina.
Euqa agenu dugina, age Anutnu nalug mec eu wawagana qee nijel.
Ija Mei ijanna ageca hom, eu age ija qee oitelein. Oso uqadodoc ijanna hocobfi age eu oiduqagan.
Age dana filfil age binanaga sulegina qa binanaga caunca osol Anutnadec ageca hocnu nijia eu ocnu wawaga qee hoolena. Euna adi wawaga meleec ihoc ligian?” aden.
“Age ija Memige Anut amegna agenu um qigen ec cain cisdowain. Oso uqa age deweneganu um qona eu Moses, uqa cesuladigian ec cisdogina.
