“Oso dahigcafi Kis tamanec cunug maadena je eu doiale! Oso gagadic mimi han wooldocobfi cal mec lecisdoc odudecnu qee nijiaun,” hena,’ odi jaqitogale,” ten.
Odocob uqa maten, “Hina Pegamam tamanecna ensel odi jaqitogale: ‘Dana han sigin walelec nahanaha aigca hewi bilina uqa je odi mahena,
“Ija hina ana biligina eu figina. Ge, Setenna king bilec cabal tawena euna biligina. Hina ija ijaninu gagadic hewagana, hina ijanu wawin meleec qee falicdol. Antipas eu ijanu gaid qasali madoloi age gemona Seten bilecna euna qocobil cal men saen euna ha ijanu wawin meleec qee qee sasac qolom,” hena.
“Euqa ija hina dewennu je oso odi nijia. Hinana eundec leih age Belamna iwaladec je hewi toodogina. Belam eu Belak uqa Isrel dana cajaca amagana aisais heligiannu iwaldon. Odocob uqa kadan tibud ihandoc cuhun joqagannuca, cajaca silail moqagannuca ihacaden.
Hinana eundec leih ha age Nikolasna iwaladec je hewi toodogina.
Eunu wawin falicdu tutuc mudagale. Qeefi, ija mahuc hinaca humig han sigin coninadec cali hona euna dana eundec cadi aqigen,” hena.
“Oso dahigcafi Kis tamanec cunug maadena je eu doiale! Oso gagadic mimi han wooldocobfi ija manna jahinec nijia eundec leih utecemin jigian. Ija eu meen senenec oso utigen. Ijan haun utigen, eu meen euna jaqec je nijia, eu oso qee dona qa eu ona himec dona,” hena,’ odi jaqitogale,” ten.
Odocob uqa maten, “Hina Taiatairana ensel odi jaqitogale: ‘Anut Melah uqa ameg eu ja belicanwe, uqa jaih eu bras walelecwe uqa je odi mahena,
“Ija hinana me odocca, hinana naluni mecca, hina wawin meleecca, hinana cewel occa, hinana gagadic tatawi culumen gahidocca eu figina. Hina qila odogona eu hahawan odom wooldoc tawena euha dugina,” hena.
“Euqa ija hina dewennu je oso odi nijia. Hina caja eu Jesebel uqa odona qee cahacdogona. Eu uqadodocnu madena, ‘Ija je hahun madec caja,’ ena, uqa ijana cewel itec dana faninadi age cajaca silail moqagannuca, kadan tibud ihandoc cuhun joqagannuca iwaladena.
Ija uqa waug falicdu tutuc migiannu saen utem qa uqa danaca silail mec hibemdu tutuc mecnu culina.
Faga, ija heludecemin uqa cabal osona sogoi hag nijigian. Uqaca silail mein eundec age Jesebel odona eu qee cuculi falicdu tutuc mecebilfi ija wawaga sogoec ben bahic adigen.
Uqana mel aqecemin cal moqagan. Ija dana cunug culunuga wawagaca temdu figina eu tamanec cunug odadecemin foqagan. Ija age eundec age osolosol agena odoc nijiawe ihoc adigen,” hena.
“Euqa Taiataira ono bilegina eundec leih age iwaladec je eu qee hewi toodogina, age age leih Setenna gug dunuh uqana ceteh egina eunu dahiniga qee qolocijelein, age eundec maadigina, ‘Ija culumen ceteh oso dewenegana qee migaun.
Euqa age hewegina eu gagadic hehewi li ija ceseli hugen,’ adigina,” hena.
“Oso gagadic mimi han wooldufei ijana odoc hewi bibileb hedoc gadacna califei ija gagadic odoc Meinadec omwe ija hatuhatu cunug uqaha ebenna maden. ‘Uqa agena king bilec age ain komna gagadic odocca cofadigian. Uqa hal qataneginawe qatanadigian,’ en,” hena.
<range>
“Ijaha malaqa boei utigen.
Oso dahigcafi Kis tamanec cunug maadena je eu doiale!” hena,’ odi jaqitogale,” ten.
Odocob uqa maten, “Hina Sadis tamanecna ensel je odi jaqitogale: ‘Anutna kis 7-pela malaqa 7-pela euca hewi bilina uqa je odi mahena, “Ija hinana odoc figina. Hinanu madi, uqa cebac bilina egina qa hina cebac qee, hina cal mec biligina.
Ija hinana odoc Anut amegna ihoc qee ninijen figina. Eunu hina seelaga, leih cebac bilegina cal mecnu odogina eu gagadic madaga.
Hina wele me je adidih om, adidih dah molog eunu cisdogale. Hina me je eu hewi biligale, hina wawin falicdu tutuc mudagale. Hina qee seelecemfi ija heje oc danawe hinaca hugen. Ija cel saen bahic hugen eu hina docnu qee nijiaun,” hena.
“Euqa hinana tamanec eundec leih age binanca Sadis ono bilegina eu age agena lotoc qee gegehin mudelein. Eu age ihoc, age ijaca lotoc senenec bahic tataqi cobeqan,” hena.
“Oso gagadic mimi han wooldocobfi eu odiwe lotoc senenec bahic tataqi biligian. Ija uqa ijan cebac bilec bukna tawena euna qee cacu qeligaun. Ija Meica uqana enselca amagana qasali mamadi, uqa ijana bilitina igen.
Oso dahigcafi Kis tamanec cunug maadena je eu doiale!” hena,’ odi jaqitogale,” ten.
Odocob uqa maten, “Hina Filadelfia tamanecna ensel je odi jaqitogale: ‘Gun meleca uqa Dewidna ki hewi bilina, uqa jic hudeceb oso qee meneiaun, uqa jic meneceb oso qee hudiaun eu uqa je odi mahena,
“Ija hinana odoc eu figina. Hina gagadic odoc nagca biligina qa ijana je toodu hewi bilem, hina ija ijaninu qee qee sasac qolom eu dugina. Faga, ija hina amenna jic cebec hudem, oso eu menecnu ihoc qee.
Faga, ija dana eu age Setenna cuha jonadec age madi, ege Judadec egina qa Judadec qee, age uhulegina eu odadecemin age humeig hina jaimna jogoi hinanu cuha foqagan. Ija hina nalunin migina eu age camasac foqagan.
Ija hina gagadic tatawi culumen gahidoga ec mahecemin je eu toodu hewi bilemnu ija hina temadec saenna eu mahana bilegina cunug temadigiannu hona eu odihiaunnu cidachigen.
Ija mahuc hugen,” hena. “Hinana king katakat oso cawalheiaunnu hina hewagana eu hewihewidogale.
Oso gagadic mimi han wooldocobfi ija ijana Anut uqana cuha jona nah man mudigen. Euna cuculi nuecnu haun qee nijiaun. Euqa uqa dewegna ijana Anut ijanca ijana Anut uqana jobon ijanca jaqigen. Jobon eu Jerusalem haun, eu sao jobonnadec ijana Anutnadec toni nigian. Ija ijanigul haun euha dewegna jaqigen.
Oso dahigcafi Kis tamanec cunug maadena je eu doiale!” hena,’ odi jaqitogale,” ten.
Odocob uqa maten, “Hina Leodisia tamanecna ensel je odi jaqitogale: ‘Eu mele, uqa Anutna je cunug gaidgaid tutuc qasali maadena, uqa Anut ceteh ifanen uqana gug qoc tawec eu uqa je odi mahena,
“Ija hinana odoc figina. Hina daec qee, hina dain gulgulecca qee. Hina gemona dadainca himec biligina. O, hina daec biloumda, qeefi dain gulgulecca biloumda!
Eunu hina dadainca himec biliginanu, daecca qee, dain gulgulecca qee, ija coninadec cin qihecemin nuegan.
Ge, hina madagana, ‘Ija cehewanica, ija cabi ocomin cehewani benca men, ija ceteh osonu qee oga tena,’ agana. Euqa dogona, hina amen lulca, hina walocca, hina sawen bahic, hina amen galuc mec, hina bical biligina eu hinadodoc qee fagana.
Eunu ija je odi mahigina. Hina cehewainca megannu gold jana wesalecebil euna soidocca bahic mena ijanadec fajagale. Hina bical majain hec camasac meiaunnu hina ijanadec lotoc senenec bahic fajimeg taqagale. Hina fecnu ihoc marasin ijanadec fajimeg amen joudagale.
Dogina, ija age nalunuga migina eundec qisaadigina, eundec ulauladigina. Eunu hina wawin falicdu megameg mimi tutuc mudagale,” hena.
“Faga, ija jic cebecna lige bili tatawi gougoudugina. Oso ija jejeni dumei jic cebec hudecebfi ija uqaca lecemin ija uqaca sab jewan,” hena.
“Oso gagadic mimi han wooldocobfi ijaha han wooldocomin Meica uqana king bilec cabalna bilohwe uqa ijaca ijana king bilec cabalna bilewannu cois ec madugen.
Oso dahigcafi Kis tamanec cunug maadena je eu doiale!” hena,’ odi jaqitogale,” ten.
Ceteh eu hedocob ija majaudoc osona fem, ija sao jobonna jic cebec oso huden tatawen fem. Odocob jejeg eu taul jejeg cinigwe mamaden wele dah mem eu uqa maten, “Hina ene becem ija ceteh i hedocob cel ceteh caligian eu ihachigen,” ten.
Mahuc bahic Kis hewiti ibulteceb ija king bilec cabal oso sao jobonna ono tatawen fem, oso uqa king bilec cabal euna bibilen fem.
Uqa bilen eu uqa ola meen jaspaca meen golca eu konilian cinigwe guaena. Wal oso king bilec cabal eu talildon, eu meen cadibca emeral cinigwe.
King bilec cabal 24 age king bilec cabal eu talildoin. Dana matu 24 age king bilec cabal 24 euna bilein. Dana matu eu age lotoc senenec bahic tacein, age king katakat goldna mudec ilomogana gulodoin.
King bilec cabal eunadec amel falefaleeceb uceldoc benca calecebil qeli ququen. King bilec cabal amegna cejal 7-pela gogowi tawein, eu age Anutna kis 7-pela.
King bilec cabal amegna macas oso nijen, eu glas cinigwe, eu camasac bahic. Ceteh cebac 4-pela age king bilec cabal tawen euna talildoin, age nanaha tawein. Ceteh cebac 4-pela eu age amaga mati bahicca, olanagana hibilemeganaca amaga jahuldoin.
Ceteh cebac oso eu laion fec cinigwe, ceteh cebac oso eu bulmakau fec cinigwe, ceteh cebac oso uqa ola eu dana ola fec cinigwe, ceteh cebac oso eu man fululec ben cababac cinigwe ohis fululi cobona fec cinigwe.
Ceteh cebac 4-pela cunug age hojonoga 6-pela bilein. Age cunug dewenega cunugca hojonoga bisaluca amaga euha jahuldoc bilein. Witic cahinegca age due silecnu qee culoloig: “Anut Tibud uqa gagadic odocca, uqa Gun, uqa Gun, uqa Gun. Uqa qila bilina, uqa gaid biloloi, uqa hugian,” oloig.
Ceteh cebac eu age king bilec cabalna bilina, uqa gaid bileceb catanena eunu eeldumeig binan sulein, ege hegaga ein, saen euna
dana matu 24 age king bilec cabalna bilina, uqa gaid bileceb catanena, uqa amegna toni mahuli cosolimeig eunu cuha feginanu. Age agena king katakat king bilec cabal amegna cacuti qelimeig due sileginanu:
“Egena Tibud, egena Anut, hina ceteteh cunug bilegina eu ifani mem. Hina hinana cisdocna eu ifani madem, age hinana cisdocna bilegina. Eunu hina kobolkobolca, binain sulecca, gagadic odocca ocnu ihoc,” egina.
King bilec cabalna bilen uqa eben meulana jaqec je col qoc oso bibilen fem. Jaqec je col qoc eu jaqec je dunuhna ganacnaca nijen. Eu sisi mec 7-pela libec ninijegin.
Odocob ija ensel gagadic odocca fem. Uqa co suli u maden, “In uqa sisi mec libec eu wagaladimei jaqec je col qoc eu huleldocnu ihoc?” en.
Euqa oso sao jobonnafo, mahanafo, maha bisalunafo uqa jaqec je col qoc eu huleldumei dunuh fecnu ihoc oso qee bilel.
Oso uqa jaqec je col qoc eu huleldumei dunuh fecnu ihoc oso qee bilel eunu ija geh qajem.
Odocob dana matu oso maten, “Hina cain qajagaun! Faga! Dana ben gagadic odocca eu laion uqa Juda sihulnadec, uqa King Dewid Melah, uqa sisi mec libec 7-pela eu wagaladimei jaqec je col qoc eu huleldugiannu han wooldon,” ten.
Odocob ija Sipsip Nag oso qocobil cal mecwe uqa king bilec cabal gemona tatawen fem. Ceteh cebac 4-pela eu age talildoin. Dana matu eu age taliladein. Uqa kom 7-pela, uqa ameg 7-pela. Eu age Anutna kis 7-pela, Anut suladeceb mahamaha cunugna beladein.
Odocob Sipsip Nag eu limei king bilec cabalna bilina uqa eben meulanadec jaqec je col qoc on.
Uqa jaqec je col qoc u hedocob ceteh cebac 4-pelaca, dana matu 24ca age Sipsip Nag amegna toni mahuli cosolein. Age osolosol gita cinigwe hewein. Ageha osolosol boh goldna mudec hewein. Boh goldna mudec eu cunug ja casuc dedeman me bahic am bein. Ja casuc dedeman me bahic eu Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca agena inondoc.
Odimeig age due haun oso odi silein: “Age qihecebil cal mem. Hina hinana ihanec cal mecna Anutnu dana caja sihul filfilnadecca, je madec filfilnadecca, dewenega filfilnadecca, hatu filfilnadecca fajadem. Hina odadecem age nawel tawec ihanec dana ibuldoin, age cofaadi bibilebil egena Anut cewel utoin. Age mahamaha cunug agena king biluqagan Eunu hina jaqec je col qoc eu umeg uqana sisi mec libec wagaladecnu ihoc,” ein.
<range>
Odocob ija haun feciimig ensel mati bahic, am geh bahic jejenega dah mem, eu sanijecnu ihoc qee. Age king bilec cabalca, ceteh cebac ageca, dana matu ageca taliladein.
Age conoga suli u due silein: “Sipsip Nag qoin eu uqa gagadic odocca, cehewan gehca, doc silecca, hihibanca, binan sulecca, kobolkobolca, eeldocca ocnu ihoc,” ein.
Odocob ija ceteh filfil age sao jobonna bileginaca, age mahana bileginaca, age maha bisaluna bileginaca, age macasna bileginaca eu age cunugca due sisilegin dah mem: “King bilec cabalna bilinaca Sipsip Nagca ale kobolkobolca, ale hihibanalaca eunu ege gaid eelalecomun catanena, ege gaid binanala sulalocomun catanena,” ein.
Odocob ceteh cebac 4-pela eu age madein, “Mele!” ein. Odocob dana matu age toni mahuli cosolimeig cuha fein.
Odocob ija Sipsip Nag uqa jaqec je col qoc hehewei sisi mec libec osahicdoc eu wagaleceb fem. Odocob ija ceteh cebac 4-pela eundec oso uqa jejeg udududonawe mateceb dom, “Hina hoga!” ten.
Odocob ija feciimig hos caubca oso cacalen fem. Dana uqa hos tatacan bilen eu qalic hewen. Anut uqa han wooldocnu king katakat oso uten. Odocob uqa nuimei han wooladecnu cobon. Uqa han woolaadiaadi cobon.
Odocob Sipsip Nag uqa sisi mec libec lecisdoc eu wagaleceb ija ceteh cebac lecisdoc eu mateceb dom, “Hina hoga!” ten.
Odocob hos oso calen, eu golca bahic. Anut uqa dana hos tatacan bilen eu cois ec madocob dana age qocobqocobececnu uqa dana cajaca age mahana bilegina odadeceb malol qee bilegina, age han cadecnu himec bilegina. Anut uqa han cadec sigin ben oso cabi eu ugiannu uten.
Odocob Sipsip Nag uqa sisi mec libec cijeddoc wagaleceb ija ceteh cebac cijeddoc eu mateceb dom, “Hina hoga!” ten. Odocob ija feciimig hos casca cacalen oso fem. Odocob dana uqa hos tatacan bilen uqa ebenna skel oso hewen.
Odocob ija ceteh cebac 4-pela gemonadec jejeg oso cinigwe odi madecebil dom, “Hinana cabi ocnu nuecem sabnu cahel ben caligian. Dana cajaca cunug age wit lita osol eu cabi oc deel osolnu qaig ocna fajoqagan! Age bali lita cijed euha cabi oc deel osolnu qaig ocna fajoqagan! Euqa hina mool wainca cain me qee malagaun!” en.
Odocob Sipsip Nag uqa sisi mec libec 4-peladoc eu wagaleceb ija ceteh cebac 4-peladoc eu matecebil dom, “Hina hoga!” ten.
Odocob ija feciimig hos jan jedocca cacalen fem. Dana uqa hos tatacan bilen ijan eu Cal Mec. Odocob Dol Jobon eu toodu cemenug hon. Odocob Anut eu age dana cajaca mahana bilegina naha qatani 4-peladoc oso aqecnu cabi gagadic odoc alen, eu ale han siginnaca, sabnu cahelnaca, hag me qee mecnaca, dool cus mahanadec eunaca aqecebil cal mecnu alen.
Odocob Sipsip Nag uqa sisi mec libec 5-peladoc wagaleceb ija ihanec cabal bisaluna dolonogail leih ninijegin fem. Dolonogail eu dana age Anutna jenuca, age me je qasali maadein eunuca aqecebil cal mein agena.
Dolonogail eu age jejenega ben utai madein, “O Ben, hina gun, hinana ceteh cunug eu mele himec! Ege hina dana cajaca mahana bilegina age qigein eu gesiladimeg ameg wadacadogannu saen ganic sumudeqan?” ein.
Odocob Anut eundec osolosol lotoc cecelac senenecca adimei age aqeinwe odi agena cabi cotogailca wawaga meleec cotogailca age aqoqagan eu sanijec ihoc ligiannu age nag odi jaen mudeigale ec maaden.
Odocob Sipsip Nag uqa sisi mec libec 6-peladoc eu wagaleceb ija feciimig mim ben nenen fem. Odocob cam ibuldumei tu hon, eu bek duh noc cinigwe. Odocob jagel ibuldumei golten, eu golac cinigwe.
Odocob malaqa age na dan fufu ben bahic fuludu lahiluhududueceb dan aig qee buic mec tonoginawe saonadec mahana tonein.
Odocob sao jausen, eu jaqec je col qonawe col qon. Odocob aluhca nuica cunug agena cudun culimeig onoca belein.
Odocob mahanadec king ageca, dana ijanagaca, han dana benbenca, dana cehewanagaca, dana gagadicca, dana qee besiadecca, dana besiadecca, dana age meen hatinnanaca meen ben aluhna nijegina eunanaca cunug busali limeig jahunein.
Age meen ben aluhcanu utai maadein, “King bilec cabalna bilinaca, Sipsip Nagca ale gemanala becnu deel ben eu wele hon. Oso uqa eu wooldocnu ihoc qee bilel. Eunu age ege gubogimeig king bilec cabalna bilina uqa olaca, Sipsip Nag uqana gemag becca eunu jahunigeiga!” ein.
<range>
Ceteh eu hedocob ija ensel 4-pela age maha medeh 4-pelana tatawegin fem. Age mahana fufu 4-pela gagadicca eu mahafo, macasfo, na osofo fuluadeiaunnu hewein.
Odocob ija ensel oso uqa cam tobi bena isec cali hohon fem, uqa Anut cebac bilina uqana sisi mec hewen. Uqa co suli u ensel 4-pela Anut maha macasca me qee mudoqagannu gagadic odoc aden eu utai
maaden, “Age mahafo, macasfo, nafo eu mahuc cain me qee madowain. Ege casac egena Anutna sisi mec eu uqana cewel oc dana ilomoga domonnana madeqan,” aden.
Odocob ija dana cajaca sisi madec oin eu sanijec 144,000 ec dom, eu dana cajaca 144,000 age Isrel agena sihul cunugnadec.
12,000 age Juda sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Ruben sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Gad sihulnadec age sisi madec oin,
12,000 age Asa sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Naptalai sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Manasa sihulnadec age sisi madec oin,
12,000 age Simion sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Liwai sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Isaka sihulnadec age sisi madec oin,
12,000 age Sebjulan sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Josef sihulnadec age sisi madec oin, 12,000 age Benjamin sihulnadec age sisi madec oin. Dana i cunug age Anutna sisi mec oin.
Ceteh eu hedocob ija feciimig dana cajaca cegulec am ben bahic fem, oso sanijadecnu ihoc qee bilel. Dana cajaca i age dewenega filfilnadecca, sihul filfilnadecca, hatu filfilnadecca, je madec filfilnadecca age king bilec cabalca Sipsip Nagca amalana tawein. Age lotoc cecelac senenec tacecca hinahin ebenegana hewecca tawein.
Age conoga suli u madein: “Egena Anut uqa king bilec cabalna bilinaca Sipsip Nagca ale cahahagesin eunu binanala suluquna!” ein.
Odocob ensel cunug age king bilec cabalca, dana matu ageca, ceteh cebac 4-pelaca taliladimeig king bilec cabal amegna toni mahuli cosolimeig Anutnu cuha fein.
Age odi madein: “Mele bahic! Ege egena Anut uqa kobolkobolca, doc silecca, binanca, gagadic odocca, hihibanca eunu ege gaid eeldocomun catanena, ege hegaga ec gaid madocomun catanena! Mele bahic!” ein.
Odocob dana matu eundec oso sisilti maten, “Dana cajaca lotoc cecelac senenecca tacec eundec age an? Dana cajaca eu age anadec hoin?” ten.
Odocob ija jejeg hewi madon, “O Dana Ben, ija qee dugina qa hina dogona,” don. Odocob uqa maten, “Dogona, dana cajaca i age cilehadec ben eunadec cagasiaden. Age agena lotoc cecelac wasacudein, agena lotoc eu Sipsip Nag golacna soidocobil senen men.
Eunu ‘age Anutna king bilec cabal amegna tatawi uqana tempelna cahineg witicca gaid cewel utogina. King bilec cabalna bilina uqa agena cofadec gaid biligian.
Sipsip Nag uqa king bilec cabal gemona taweia uqa sipsip cofadec danawe cofadigian. Eunu age haun wen qee adeiaun, wa gab qee adeiaun. Cam haun dewenega qee cijadeiaun, dain oso qee welacadeiaun. Odimei uqa iwaladi cocobi cebac bilec wa fifiji becna euna ehi li madigian. Odocob Anut uqa amaga amulunuga cunug cacu heliadigian,’ en,” ten.
<range>
Odocob Sipsip Nag uqa sisi mec libec 7-peladoc eu wagaleceb aua naha odi sao jobon tiliec bahic nijen.
Odocob ija ensel 7-pela Anut amegna tatawegin fem. Age taul 7-pela adein.
Odocob ensel oso uqa humei ihanec cabal cemenug tawen. Uqa boh goldna mudec ja casuc dedeman me bahic wawasen hewen. Age uqa ja casuc dedeman geh bahicca, Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca cunug agena inondocca ihanec cabal goldna mudec tatacan eu king bilec cabal amegna tawen euna gabanalecnu utein.
Odocob ja casuc dedemanca Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca agena inondocca gabanalec alena ja casuc ensel uqa Anut amegna tawen ebennadec caji ten.
Odocob ensel eu boh ja casuc dedeman me bahicca eu umei ja ihanec cabalnadec eu taceceb am beceb uqa mahana qeleceb toni non. Eu qeleceb udududoc uceldoc benca calecebil amel faleeceb mahana mim non.
Odocob ensel 7-pela age agena taul 7-pela fuldocnu saciadoin.
Ensel osahicdoc eu uqana taul fuldon. Odocob wa ais aigca jaca, golacca gabanadec calimei nu mahana toni non. Odocob maha naha qatani cijeddoc oso eu ja cijen, odocob na cunug agena naha qatani cijeddoc oso eu ja cijen, odocob gigisac cadibca cunug eu ja cijen.
Odocob ensel lecisdoc eu uqana taul fuldon. Ceteh oso eu fecnu aluh benwe ja ciji teten macasna toni non. Odocob macas naha qatani cijeddoc oso eu golac ibuldon.
Odocob cebac bilec ceteh age macasna bilegina age naha qatani cijeddoc oso eu cal mein. Odocob wag ben age naha qatani cijeddoc oso eu fadalein.
Odocob ensel cijeddoc eu uqana taul fuldon. Malaqa ben bahic oso uqa cejalwe gowona saonadec toni non. Eu wa age naha qatani cijeddoc osona toni non, wa fifiji bec euna toni non.
Malaqa ijan eu Gulihinca. Wa naha qatani cijeddoc oso eu gulihinca calen. Odocob wa eu gulihincanu dana mati age wa eu jimeig cal mein.
Odocob ensel 4-peladoc eu uqana taul fuldon. Age camca, jagelca, malaqa cunugca agena fulacdoc naha qatani cijeddoc oso eu tu caligiannu age naha qatani cijedadec oso aqein. Odocob cahineg naha qatani cijeddoc oso cam qee fulacdol, odocob witic naha qatani cijeddoc oso jagel malaqaca qee fulacdoloin.
Odocob ija feciimig man fululec ben cababac cinigwe uqa sao ohisna fululi cocobi co suli umei utai madeceb dom, “O, dana cajaca cunug mahana bilegina eu age walocca bahic, walocca bahic, walocca bahic! Saen ensel cijed eu age haun taul fuldoqaga bili eunu odoc walocca bahic adigian!” en.
Odocob ensel 5-peladoc eu uqana taul fuldon. Ija malaqa oso saonadec mahana totonen eu fem. Anut uqa ki oso uten, eu maha heel ben eu dunuh bahic non gugca qee eu uqana.
Malaqa eu heel ben eu uqana cebec hudeceb casuc eu ja ben bahic uqana casuc calenawe heel ben eunadec calen. Odocob casuc heel ben eunadec caleceb eu cam saoca jahulaleceb tu mesin.
Odocob casucnadec sis mati bahic age mahana toni nein. Anut uqa sis eu gagadic odoc eu lacbaia mahanadec agena gagadic odocwe aden.
Odocob Anut uqa age gigisac mahanaca, ceteh oso cebac bagacca, na cunugca, cain me qee madowainnu maaden. Euqa dana cajaca age Anutna sisi mec ilomoga domonna qee tawel eu himec me qee madoqagannu maaden.
Odocob Anut uqa sis eu culadeceb age jagel 5-pela dana cajaca aqi jejegin dain ben aden, qa culadeceb age dana cajaca aqi jejegin dain ben aaden qee cal melein. Sis eu agena aqi jeceb dain ben adec eu lacbaia aqi jeceb dain ben adenawe odi.
Saen euna dana cal moqagannu jic waloqagan qa qee gulucdowain. Age cal mecnu gaunan manoqagan qa cal mec eu agenu busaligian.
Sis eu age hos han cadoqagannu saciadu taweginawe odi fem. Age ilomogana eu king katakat goldna mudec cinigwe gulodoin. Age olanaga eu dana olanagawe.
Age gosiniga eu caub caja gosiniga cinigwe. Age aimiga eu laion aimiga cinigwe.
Age culunuga eu kapa siot cinigwe jahuldoin. Age hojonoga eu karis geh bahic hos diadeceb hanna guguli bebelegin karis uceldonawe.
Age hohunuga eu lacbaia hohunuga dudulenca cinigwe. Age dana cajaca jagel 5-pela odi aqi jejegin dain ben aadien eu uqana gagadic odoc eu hohunugana nijia.
Agena king eu ensel uqa maha heel ben dunuh bahic non gugca qee eu cofdona. Hibru agena jena ensel eu ijan eu Abadon. Grik agena jena ijan eu Apolion, alena gug eu Fadaladec Dana.
Odoc walocca osahicdoc eu hedon. Faga, odoc walocca lecis haun howasannu nijia.
Odocob ensel 6-peladoc eu uqana taul fuldon. Ija jejeg oso eu kom 4-pela ihanec cabal goldna mudec eu Anut amegna tawen eunadec dah mem.
Jejeg eu ensel 6-peladoc eu madon, “Ensel 4-pela eu age Jufretis wa benna jeladec bilegina eu cufaladecem beleiga,” don.
Odocob uqa 4-pela eu cufaladeceb belein. Ensel 4-pela eu age aua euna himec, deel euna himec, jagel euna himec, cabi gel euna himec age dana cajaca cunug naha qatani cijeddoc oso aqecebil cal moqagannu saciadoc bilia.
Han dana age hos tatacan bilein eu agena sanijec eu 200 milion odi eunu dah mem.
Ijana majaudocna han dana hos tatacan bibilegin odi fem. Han dana age kapa siot tacein, eu agena bala eu golca bahic ja cinigwe, eu cadibca bahic, eu janca bahic sulfa cinigwe. Hos ilomoga eu laion ilomoga cinigwe, age conoganadec jaca, casucca, ja meen jan dainca calen.
Hos eu agena gagadic odoc eu conoganaca hohunuganaca nijina. Age hohunuga eu man sononec ilo cinigwe, age euna dana cajaca aqi jeadegina. Odocob dana me qee madecnu ceteh cijed eu age jaca, casucca, ja meen jan dainca conoganadec calena euna dana cajaca cunug age mahana bilegina eu naha qatani cijeddoc oso aqecebil cal mein.
<range>
Odocob dana cajaca leih age me qee madecnu ceteh cijed eu qee aqecebil cal melein eu age agena kadan tibud age ebenegana mudadein eunu qee hibemdoloin. Age kadan tibud me qee eu goldnaca, silwanaca, brasnaca, meennaca, nanaca mudec ageca, buga me qee ageca agenu cuha fegina eunu qee tului falicdoloin. Kadan tibud eu age fecwe qee, age dah mecwe qee, age cobocwe qee.
Dana i age agena dana aqecnu odoc euca, agena ceeh jeladecnu odoc euca, agena silail cajaca nijecnu odoc euca, agena heje ocnu odoc euca eu cunugnu qee tului falicdoloin.
Odocob ija ensel gagadic odocca oso sao jobonnadec nenen fem. Uqa dewegna taen oso lotocwe taqen, uqa ilo walna talildon, uqa ola eu cam ameg cinigwe, uqa jaih eu nah man jaca cinigwe.
Uqa jaqec je col qoc nag oso huleldoc ninijen ebenna hewen. Uqa jaih meula eu macasna mimei jaih anse eu mahana men.
Odocob uqa laion euenawe co suli umei utaen. Uqa eui hedocob udududoc 7-pela eu age guhudumeig age agena je madein.
Age je madi hedodogin ija je jaqige odomqa ija jejeg oso sao jobonnadec dah mimigin maten, “Udududoc 7-pela i age guhududu madein eu hina jahuni cisdocna himec mecem bilia. Cain jaqagaun!” ten.
Odocob ensel macasnaca mahanaca dacali tatawen fem eu eben meula ohisdocob sao jobonna teceb
uqa uqa gaid bileceb catanena eu uqa saoca mahaca macasca ifanaden, eu cunug euna bilegina ifanen eu uqa ijanna je cagu maden. Uqa odi maden, “Anut uqa haun qee daleeiaun!
Euqa ensel 7-peladoc eu uqana taul fuldugian saen euna Anut uqa uqana jahunec je wele uqana cewel utoc dana eu, je hahun madec dana maaden eu uqana aig camasac mudigian,” en.
Odocob jejeg sao jobonnadec maten ija wele dah mem eu haun maten, “Hina limeg jaqec je col qoc nag eu huleldoc ninijen ensel uqa macasnaca mahanaca dacali tawena eu uqa ebenna nijia eu oga,” ten.
Odocob ija enselca limig madom, “Hina jaqec je col qoc nag hewagana eu itiga,” dom. Odocob uqa ija maten, “Umeg jaga. Eu hina wawinna gulihin tigian qa hina conna eu tinca uben wa cinigwe ibuldugian,” ten.
Odocob ija ensel eu ebennadec jaqec je col qoc nag eu umig jem. Odocomin eu conina tinca uben wa cinigwe tebandom qa jigin ni hedocomin wawi dunuhna eu gulihin ten.
Odocob age matein, “Hina Anutna je hahun eunu dana cajaca age dewenega filfilnadecca, age hatu filfilnadecca, age je madec filfilnadecca, king filfilca eu maadeiga,” tein.
Odocob oso gadac ihoc mec na oso iten, eu kom cinigwe. Odocob Anut maten, “Caji limeg Anutna tempelca ihanec cabal euna bilinaca, dana cajaca age euna cuha feginaca cunug ganic sanijadaga.
Euqa ija gel maha gemo isec cudun eu Juda dana qee eundec adem. Age jagel 42 leceb Taun Gun eu lahacdoqagan. Eunu hina cudun eu cain gadac sanijigaun, eu culuga.
Ija ijanu je hahun qasali maadec dana lecis gagadic odoc alecemin ale lotoc bek duh noc cinigwe taqowasan eu ale deel 1,260 ijana je qasali maadowasan,” ten.
Dana lecis i ale eu na oliw lecisca, gowoc lecisca eu maha cunug uqana Tibud amegna tawesina.
Odocob oso me qee maligiannu odocobfi ja conolanadec cali humei alena cad eu cijadigian. Dana oso uqa me qee maligiannu odona eu odi cijeceb cal migian.
Anut uqa gagadic odoc aleceb ale je hahun mamadebil saen euna sao hudeceb wa qee neiaunnu gagadic muduwasan. Anut uqa gagadic odoc aleceb ale wa fifiji bec golac ibuldugiannu gagadic muduwasan. Ale dana cajaca mahana bilegina eu me qee madecnu ceteh filfilna aqowasannu gagadic mowasan. Ceteh cunug odocnu ale alena gale alecna eu odi odowasan.
Ale Anutna je qasali maadi hedocobil saen euna dool cus me qee uqa maha heel ben dunuh bahic non gugca qee eunadec ohis tobi bigian. Uqa han cadimei woolalimei aqaleceb cal mowasan.
Odocob ale dewenela ganac eu taun ben uqana jicna nijesin, alena Tibud age na babalecna tuitu qocobil cal men euna. Ege galolo je madecna taun ben eu madi, Sodom Isipca oqona.
Odocob dana dewenega filfilnadecca, sihul filfilnadecca, je madec filfilnadecca, hatu filfilnadecca age cunug deel cijed nahaca leceb ale dewenela ganac fecialein. Dana eu age heel cisalecnu cois qee owain.
Je hahun madec dana eu ale dana cajaca mahanadec wawaga culumen sogoecca adowasan. Eunu dana cajaca age mahana bilegina eu age ale cal mesinnu age ceeli celebooqagan, age ceteh bagol utecebuteceboqagan.
Odocob deel cijed nahaca hedocob Anut cebac bilec kis suldocob ale dunuhna len. Odocobil ale wasimesi tawesin. Odocobil cunug age fecialimeig age geh bahic cucuiein.
Odocob je hahun madec dana lecis eu ale jejeg ben oso sao jobonnadec maaleceb dah mesin, “Ohis ene besia!” aleceb alena cad amagana ale taenna sao jobon tesin.
Saen euna dih mim ben neceb taun ben eu naha qatani 10-peladoc oso eu fadalen. Odocob dana cajaca 7,000 odi cal mein. Dana cajaca leih bilein eu age geh bahic cucuiein. Odocob age Anut uqa sao jobon bilia eu binan sulein.
Odoc walocca lecisdoc eu hedoia qa faga, odoc walocca cijeddoc eu isi hugian.
Odocob ensel 7-peladoc eu uqana taul fuldon. Odocob jejenega ben sao jobonna utai maden: “Mahana cul eu egena Tibud, uqana Kraisca alena cul ibuldon. Uqa king gaid cofadi bileceb catanigian,” en.
Odocob dana matu 24 age agena king bilec cabalna Anut amegna bilegina eu age toni mahuli cosolimeig Anutnu cuha fein.
Age madein: “O Anut Tibud gagadic odocca, hina qila biligina, hina gaid bilolog, hina hinana gagadic odoc umeg mahana king bilecnu sanan maga. Eunu ege hegaga hoqona!
Juda dana qee eundec age gemanaga beia qa hina gemain becnu saen eu qila caleia. Qila hina cal mec dana gesiladegan. Qila hina hinana cewel oc dana, eu age je hahun madec danaca, qagu coboc dana eu age dana hina ijainnu cumunegina euca, age ijanagaca, ijanagaca qee eu agena aig qoc wadacadegan! Dana age dana cajaca mahana bilegina eu fadaladegina eunu qila wadac fadaladegan!” ein.
Odocob Anutna cuha jo sao jobon bilia eu huden. Age cuha jo dunuhna Anutna bal cehec je alildoc cudaug eu ono camasac tatawen fein. Odocob amel falefaleeceb uceldoc benca calecebil qeli ququeceb mahana mim nen, wa ais aig culumenca nen.
Odocob sao jobonna kobolkobol ben oso cali hon. Caja oso bilen, uqa dewegna cam eu lotocwe taqen, jagel eu jaih bisalu nijen, uqa ilona eu king katakat tacen eu malaqa 12-pelana mudec.
Uqa melca bilen, uqa mel basecnu dain adena eu uqaca cali hon. Uqa mel basigiannu dain don eu me qee bahic odudeceb uqa gehca utaen.
Odocob sao jobonna kobolkobol ben oso haun calen. Eu man sononec ben golca ono tawen. Uqa ilo eu 7-pela, uqana kom eu 10-pela. Uqana ilo 7-pela euna king katakat nag abesabes guloaden, eu cunug eu 7-pela.
Odocob uqa hohugna malaqa naha qatani cijeddoc oso saonadec segadimei mahana qeladeceb tonoin. Odocob man uqa caja eu uqa mel baseceb jigiannu amegna tawen.
Odocob caja eu mel manahal basen, mel eu uqa ain kom hewimei dana cajaca sihul cunugnadec gagadic odocna cofadigian. Euqa Anut odocob mel nag eu mahucwe ohis ti nui Anutca uqana king bilec cabal euna ten.
Caja eu busali wadauna nuen, Anut uqana cudun saciadonnu. Ono age cofdumeig deel 1,260 leceb sab utuqagan.
Odocob han ben sao jobonna cali hon. Maikel uqana enselca age man sononec ben eu cadein. Odocob man sononec ben eu uqana enselca age wadacdu cadein.
Euqa uqa han wooldocnu gagadicca qee. Odocob uqa uqana ensel am gami haun sao jobonna bilecnu qee telein.
Odocob age man sononec ben eu qeludecebil tonen. Man sononec ben eu wele gug qoc saenna bilen, age Balijec Dana egina, age Setenha egina. Uqa dana cajaca cunug age mahana bilegina eu uhuladec dana. Age uqaca uqana enselca qeladecebil mahana tonein.
Odocob ija sao jobonna jejeg ben oso dah mimigin utai maden: “Seten uqa egena Anut amegna egena cotigeil cahineg witicca age deweneganu um ququ tawena eu age qeludecebil mahana tonen. Age agedodoc cebac bilec hewecnu qee odoloin qa age agena wawaga meleecnu cal mein. Eunu ege cotigeil Sipsip Nag uqana ihanec cal mecnaca, agena je mele qasali maadecnaca age Seten wooldoin. Qila egena Anut uqa uqana dana cajaca cahahaadigian! Qila uqa uqana gagadic odoc umei uqa king bibili cofadigian! Qila uqana Krais eu uqa ijan ben umei maha cunug cofdugian!
<range>
Eunu age sao jobonna bilegina eu ceeleigale! Euqa Seten uqa uqana saen eu gohic eu uqa donanu uqa gemag ben, uqa age mahanaca macasnaca bilegina ageca toni nen. Eunu age walocca bilegina!” en.
Odocob man sononec ben eu qeludecebil mahana tonen ec dumei uqa caja mel manahal basen eu jabi cobon.
Oso caja eu man fululec ben bahic cababac cinigwe eu uqana hojon lecis eu uteceb uqa man sononec cemenugdec fululi nui uqana cudun wadauna ligian. Ono cabi gel cijed nahaca leceb age sabna cofdoin.
Odocob man sononec ben eu conadec wa cue eu caja eu gahidu hewi ehi nuigiannu basecdocob cali hu li caja eu toodon.
Euqa maha uqa caja eu cesuldon, uqa biah aimei wa man sononec ben conadec cali hon eu belucdon.
Odocob man sononec ben eu caja eunu gemag ben. Uqa caja eu uqana mel leih han cadecnu nuen. Mel leih eu age Anutna loo je toodogina, age Jisasnu je qasali maadegina.
<range>
Odocob ija dool cus me qee oso macasnadec cali beben fem. Uqana kom eu 10-pela. Uqana ilo eu 7-pela. Uqana kom 10-pela abesabes eu king katakat nag gulodon. Eu ilonana ijanaga nijen. Ijanaga gug eu Anutnu je me qee maden.
Dool cus me qee ija fem eu lepat cinigwe, uqa jaih eu bea jaih cinigwe, uqa co eu laion co cinigwe. Odocob man sononec ben eu uqana gagadic odocca, uqana king bilec cabalca, cofadec cabi benca uqa dool cus me qee eu uten.
Dool cus me qee uqana ilo oso eu han sigin qeli qocobil cal mec ola onqa isoh qee meceb ilo hulufan nijen. Odocob dana cunug mahana bilegina eundec age dool cus me qee eunu tumatumaeeig toodu coboin.
Man sononec ben uqa dool cus me qee eu cofadec cabi utennu dana age man sononec bennu cuha fein. Odocob age dool cus me qee eunu ha cuha fefeig madein, “Oso uqa dool cus me qee cinigwe qee bilel. Oso uqa cadecnu ihoc qee bilel,” ein.
Odocob Anut uqa dool cus me qee eu hawadocob uqadodocnu culai uqa Anutnu je me qee maden. Anut hawadocob uqa jagel 42 ihoc lelen uqa cofadec cabi hewen.
Uqa Anutnu je me qee maden. Uqa Anut ijannuca, Anutna bilec cudunnuca, cunug age sao jobonna bilegina eundecnuca je me qee maden.
Anut hawadocob uqa Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca cadimei wooladen. Anut uqa gagadic odoc uteceb uqa sihul filfilnadecca, dewenega filfilnadecca, je madec filfilnadecca, hatu filfilnadecca dana cunug agena cofadec bilen.
Dana cunug age mahana bilegina eundec age Sipsip Nag age qocobil cal men eu uqana cebac bilec bukna ijanaga qee jaqec taweia, eu age dool cus me qee eunu cuha foqagan. Ijanaga eu Anut maha cunug qee ifanec saen eunadec qee jaqec taweia.
Oso dahigcafi dah meiale.
Oso Anut age umeig gihacdoc jona mudecnu madecebfi eu mele, age uqa gihacdoc jona muduqagan. Oso Anut uqa han siginna qocobil cal mecnu madecebfi eu mele, age uqa han siginna qocobil cal migian. Je eunu Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca age agedodoc hulunuga cehecnu, age agena wawaga meleec gagadic hewecnu cisdoigale.
Odocob ija dool cus me qee oso mahanadec cali beben fem. Eu uqa kom lecisca, eu sipsip nagna kom cinigwe. Uqa man sononec benwe je maden.
Dool cus me qee milum eu uqa dool cus me qee matuna cofadec cabi oc dool cus me qee matu amegna cabi eu odon. Uqa dana cajaca cunug age mahana bilegina eundec maadeceb age dool cus me qee matu uqa han sigin qeli qocobil cal mec ola onqa isoh qee meceb ilo hulufan nijen eunu cuha fein.
Dool cus me qee milum eu kobolkobol benben odon. Uqa dana cajaca amagana odocob ja sao jobonnadec mahana tonen.
Kobolkobol eu Anut hawadocob odon euna uqa dool cus me qee matu amegna dana cajaca mahana bilegina eundec uhuladen. Uqa age eundec maadeceb age dool cus me qee matu age han sigin qeli qocobil cal men qa cebac bilina eunu ihicon qoin.
Anut hawadocob uqa dool cus me qee matu ihicon eu cebac bilecnu kis uten. Odocob ihicon eu je maden. Ihicon eu maadeceb age dana age ihicon eunu qee cuha fegina eundec aqecebil cal mein.
Dool cus me qee milum eu maadeceb age dana cunug eu age ijanagaca eundecca, age ijanagaca qee eundecca, age cehewanagaca eundecca, age cehewanagaca qee eundecca, age besiadec bilegina eundecca, age qee besiadec bilegina eundecca agena ebenega meulanafo, qee agena ilomoga domonnafo gaga oso oin.
Eunu oso uqa gaga euca qeefi eu uqa ceteh fajecnu ihoc qee, uqa ceteh idadecnu ihoc qee. Gaga eu dool cus me qee matu uqa ijanfo, qee eu ijan uqana sanijec.
Age eu doqagannufi age doc silecca bileigale. Oso uqa fogo dona eu uqa dool cus me qee matu uqana sanijec uqana gug ihoc doiale. Ge, eu danana sanijec oso, uqana sanijec eu 666.
Ija feciimig Sipsip Nag eu Saion Aluhna tatawen fem. Uqaca dana 144,000 age uqa ijanca uqa Memeg ijanna ilomoga domonna jaqec tatawegin feciadem.
Odocob ija sao jobonnadec jejeg oso dah mem. Jejeg eu docnu wa ben quhohdonawe, eu docnu wa ben guhudonawe. Jejeg eu dana age gita qoginawe.
Dana 144,000 age king bilec cabalca, ceteh cebac 4-pelaca, dana matu ageca age amagana fefeig tawein. Age ono due haun silein. Dana cunug age due eu docnu ihoc qee, euqa dana 144,000 eu Anut uqa mahanadec fajadi ceden eundec age dih due haun eu silecnu doin.
Dana eundec age dana cos, age caja gami qee nijoloig. Eunu age gegehinca qee. Dana eu age Sipsip Nag ana nueceb eu gaid toodu belegina. Dana eu age sab magah age casac cabinadec umeig Anutnuca Sipsip Nagnuca ihanegina eu cinigwe. Eunu Anut uqa dana eundec dana cunug gemonadec fajadi ceden.
Cahuldoc oso agenu qee bilel. Eunu age uhulec je oso qee madelein.
Odocob ija ensel oso sao ohisna fululi cocobon fem, dana cajaca cunug mahana bilegina eundec age hatu filfilnadecca, sihul filfilnadecca, je madec filfilnadecca, dewenega filfilnadecca eu age cunug uqa me je demico bilec eu maadigian.
Odocob uqa co suli u maden, “Anut uqa dana cunug gesiladigiannu saen eu wele cali hoia. Eunu age Anutnu cucuieigale! Uqa binan suleigale! Uqa saoca, mahaca, macasca, wa fifiji becca, ifanen eunu cuha feigale!” en.
Odocob ensel lecisdoc eu osahicdoc toodu maden, “Babilon taun ben eu wele fadali tonen! Eu wele fadali tonen! Babilon uqa wal kobol odon. Uqa odadeceb dana hatu filfilnadec cunug age toodumeig uqana wal kobol odoin, eu age wain eu gagadicca, eu belican me qeeca jecebil dalul aqenwe,” en.
Odocob ensel cijeddoc eu osahicdocca, lecisdocca tooalen. Uqa co suli u maden, “Oso uqa dool cus me qeefo, uqa ihiconfo eunu cuha fenafi, uqa ilo domonnafo, ebennafo gaga onafi
uqaha Anutna gemag bec jigian, eu wain jenawe. Wain eu waca qee ibuldoc eu uqa gabinna basecdugian. Gabin eu uqana gemag bec eu am bigian. Dana eundec age dain adec ben oqagan. Jaca ja meen jan dainca ale ensel gunca Sipsip Nagca age amagana dana eu cijadowasan.
Ja eunadec age dain aadeb eu uqana casuc gaid ohis teceb catanigian. Dana eu age dool cus me qeeca uqa ihiconca eunu cuha fegina eundecca, age uqa ijannu gaga ogina eundecca age witic cahinegca jaen qee muduwain,” en.
Je eunu Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca age agedodoc hulunuga cehecnu cisdoigale, dana eu age Anutna loo je toodu cobogina, age Jisasnu wawaga meleec hewegina.
Odocob ija sao jobonnadec jejeg oso dah mimigin maten, “Je i jaqagale. Dana cajaca age qila i hibnaca Tibudnu wawaga meleecna cal moqagan eundec ceeloqagan!” ten. Kis madena, “Eu mele! Anut agena cabi ocnu aig me wadacadigian Eunu age agena cabi oc culumenca eu culimeig jaen muduqagan,” ten.
Odocob ija feciimig ija ono taen senenecca fem. Oso uqa taen euna bilen, uqa “dana melah cinigwe,” en. Uqa king katakat goldna mudec eu ilona gubodon, uqa gunacil aigca bahic hewen.
Odocob ensel oso uqa tempelnadec cali hon. Uqa co suli u taenna bilen eu utai madon, “Mahana sab eu wele wal men. Sab qetecnu saen eu wele hon. Eunu hina hinana gunacilna sab eu qetadaga,” don.
Odocob taenna bilen eu uqana gunacil mahana wilidon. Odocob uqa mahana sab wal mec eu qetaden.
Odocob ensel oso uqa tempelnadec sao jobonna cali hon. Uqaha gunacil aigca hewen.
Odocob ensel oso uqa ihanec cabalnadec cali hon. Ensel eu uqa ja cofdona. Uqa co suli u ensel uqa gunacil aigca hewen eu utai madon, “Wain lihna aig eu cunug wele wal men. Hinana gunacilna wain aig mahana qetadaga. Hina wain lihna aig eu wain mahana nijia eu cedadaga,” don.
Odocob ensel uqana gunacil aigca eu mahana wilidumei wain aig eu uqa wain lihnadec cagadon. Odimei uqa hauadimei wain aig afdoc cudun benna qeladeceb dunuh noin, eu Anutna gemag bec.
Odocob wain aig afdoc cudun ben eu taun ben hahagum tawen. Ono age wain aig eu lahacluhucadein. Odocob golanaga eu wain aig afdoc cudun bennadec wa cuewe quhuli nuen. Wa cue eu 300 kilomita odi cecelac, eu mita lecis odi dunuh noc.
Odocob ija sao jobonna kobolkobol ben oso fem, ija eunu tumatumaem. Ono ensel 7-pela tawein. Age dana cajaca me qee madecnu ceteh 7-pela hewein. Euna Anutna gemag bec eu qee migian. Eunu ceteh me qee madec eu eundec agena cit qoc.
Odocob ija ceteh oso fem, eu macas cinigwe qa eu glasna mudec jaca ibuldoc eu cinigwe fem. Odocob ija dana cajaca age dool cus me qeeca, uqa ihiconca, oso uqa ijan eu 666ca wooladein euha fem. Age macas glasna mudec eu gesacna tawein. Age Anut gita aden eu hewi tawein.
Age Moses, uqa Anutna cewel oc dana, uqana due silein. Age Sipsip Nagna dueha silein: “O Anut Tibud Gagadic Odocca, hinana odoc eu gagadic, eu me bahic! O dana hatu filfilnadec cunug agena King, hinana odoc eu tutuc bahic, eu mele bahic!
O Tibud, hina himec gun biligina. In oso uqa hina qee cucuihiaun? In oso uqa hina ijain qee suliaun? Hinana tutuc odoc eu dana cunug amagana camasac fegina. Eunu dana age hatuhatu cunugnadec age humeig hinanu cuha foqagan,” ein.
Eu hedocob ija feciimig tempel sao jobonna tawen eu hudec fem. Talah jo eu egena sihul weledec age wadauna bibileig Anut uqa ageca bilen eu ihacaden eu tempel dunuhna bilen.
Ensel 7-pela age dana cajaca me qee madecnu ceteh 7-pela hewein eu age tempel dunuhnadec cali hoin. Age lotoc cecelac taqein, lotoc eu senenec bahic, eu soidoc bahic. Age oologam goldna mudec age mugumugana taqein.
Odocob ceteh cebac 4-pela eundec oso uqa ensel 7-pela eu boh goldna mudec 7-pela aden. Boh goldna mudec eu Anut uqa gaid cebac bileceb catanena eu uqana gemag bec am bein.
Odocob tempel eu ja casuc am ben. Ja casuc eu Anutna gagadic odocca kobolkobolca eunadec. Ensel 7-pela agena dana cajaca me qee madecnu ceteh 7-pela eu qee qee mec ninijen oso tempel dunuh lecwe qee.
Odocob ija tempelnadec jejeg ben oso dah mimigin eu ensel 7-pela eu age maaden, “Belimeig age boh 7-pela eu Anutna gemag bec am bec eu mahana basecadeiga!” aden.
Odocob ensel osahicdoc eu limei uqana boh eu basecdocob mahana non. Odocob dain ben adecnu isomoga me qee eu dana i age dool cus me qee uqana gagaca bilein, age uqa ihiconnu cuha fein eu ageca calen.
Odocob ensel lecisdoc eu uqana boh eu basecdocob macasna non. Odocob macas eu golac ibuldon, eu dana cal mec golacwe. Odocob ceteh cunug macasna cebac bilegina eu cal mein.
Odocob ensel cijeddoc eu uqana boh eu basecdocob waca wa fifiji becca euna non. Odocob age cunug golac ibuldoin.
Odocob ija wa cofdoc ensel eu dah mimigin maden: “O Dana Gun Bahic, hina qila biligina, hina gaid bilolog. Mahanadec dana age hinana qagu coboc danaca hinana je hahun madec danaca age aqecebil age golanaga toneceb cal mein. Odocob hina dana mahanadec age golanaga jecnu adem. Age agena ameg oin, eu me bahic! Eunu hinana gesiladec hina odoga eu tutuc,” en.
<range>
Odocob ija ihanec cabalnadec jejeg oso dah mimigin maden: “O Anut Tibud Gagadic Odocca, hinana gesiladec eu mele bahic, eu tutuc bahic!” en.
Odocob ensel 4-peladoc eu uqana boh eu basecdocob camna non. Eunu Anut culdocob cam bi ededeceb agagimei dana cajaca cijaden.
Cam uqana gih ben eu cijaden. Odocob age Anut uqa ceteh me qee eu cofadena eu ijannu socaec je madein. Euqa age wawaga tutuc tului falicdumeig Anut binan qee sulelein.
Odocob ensel 5-peladoc eu uqana boh eu basecdocob dool cus me qee uqana king bilec cabalna non. Odocob uqana culna tu calen. Odocob dana age dain ben adecnu agedodoc beilamaga taicdoin.
Age isomoga me qeenuca dain ben adecnuca Anut sao jobon bilia eunu socaec je madein qa agena me qee odocnu qee tului falicdoloin.
Odocob ensel 6-peladoc eu uqana boh eu basecdocob Jufretis wa benna non. Odocob wa eu galalen, eu cam tobi becnadec king hoqagannu jic qahiaden.
Odocob ija dolonoga gegehinca cijed eu cog cinigwe fem. Age man sononec ben biahnadecca, dool cus me qee biahnadecca, uhulec je hahun madec dana biahnadecca cali hoin.
Dolonoga eu age buga me qee agena kobolkobol odogina. Dolonoga cijed eu age hatuhatu cunug agena king ageca belegina eu ageca limeig age king eu Anut gagadic odocca uqana gesiladecnu deel benna han cadecnu mede aqegina.
“Dogina! Ija heje oc danawe hugen! Oso uqa ameg cebac bilina, uqa uqana lotoc taqena eunu uqa bical qee coboiaun, uqa amagana qee majag doiaun eu uqa ceelec biligian!” en.
Odocob dolonoga gegehinca eu age king eu cedadi li cudun age Hibru jena Amagedon egina euna mede aqein.
Odocob ensel 7-peladoc eu uqana boh eu basecdocob saona non. Odocob jejeg ben oso king bilec cabalnadec tempelna maden, “Eu hedoia!” en.
Odocob amel falefaleeceb uceldoc benca calecebil qeli ququeceb mahana mim ben bahic nen. Dana mahana bilegina eu saen cunugna mim eundec oso wele qee nel. Mim eu mim wooldoc oso qee nel.
Odocob taun ben eu qatani cijeddon. Odocob taun ben cunug mahana nijegina eu age toni aqen. Anut uqa Babilon Ben eunu cisdon. Uqa gabin uteceb uqa Anutna gabinnadec wain eu cunug ji hedon. Wain eu Anutna gemag jawe bec.
Odocob nui cunug busali beli hedoin. Aluh cunug qee mi hedoin.
Wa ais aig eu culumen ben bahic soanadec dana cajaca dewenegana toni nen. Wa ais aig eundec osol uqana culumen eu 50 kilogram odi. Dana age wa ais aig tonennu Anutnu socaec je madein. Ge, wa ais aig tonen eu me qee bahic.
Odocob ensel 7-pela age boh 7-pela hewein eundec oso humei maten, “Hina hoga. Ija wal caja binanca eu adi uqana gesildoc gulucdugiannu ihachigen, wal caja eu wa mati bahic alildoc euna bilen.
Mahanadec king age uqaca nijein, dana cajaca mahana bilegina eu age uqana wain jecebil dalul aqen. Wain eu uqana wal kobol odoc eunu,” ten.
Odocob Kis ijaca hu hewiti ibulteceb ensel eu wadauna ehi li miten. Ono ija caja uqa dool cus me qee golca oso tatacan bibilen fem. Dool cus me qee eu deweg cunugna ijan mati bahic eu Anutnu je me qee jaqec fem. Dool cus me qee eu ilo 7-pela euca bilen, uqa uqana kom 10-pelaca bilen.
Caja eu lotoc golca tacen. Gol bala filfilca, meen jaca, gilolo qaig ohisca eu uqa deweg cunug jahuldoc. Uqa ebenna gabin goldna mudec eu hewen. Gabin eu ceteh bebesacca, ceteh gegehincaca am bec. Eu uqana wal kobol odoc eundec aig.
Uqa ilo domonna ijan jahunec oso jaqen eu: “BABILON BEN, WAL CAJA CUNUGCA DANA KOBOL ME QEE ODOGINA MAHANA BILEGINA EUNDEC AGE ANAGA,” en.
Caja eu uqa Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca golanagaca, dana cajaca age Jisasnu wawaga meleec qasali maadecnu aqecebil cal mein eu age golanagaca jimei dalul qocob bibilen eu ija fem. Ija uqa odi fimig tumatumaem.
Euqa ensel eu sisilten, “Eetanu tumatumaagana? Ija caja eunu jahunec gug mahigen. Ijaha dool cus me qee eu ilo 7-pela euca uqa uqana kom 10-pelaca uqa caja eu gahidona eu uqana jahunec gug mahigen.
Dool cus me qee eu hina faga eu wele bilen qa qila qee bilel. Uqa maha heel ben eu dunuh bahic non gugca qee eunadec cali bigia odona. Uqa limei isi uqana fadalec ugian. Dana cajaca age mahana bilegina eu ijanaga cebac bilec bukna Anut maha cunug qee ifanec ninijen saen eu hocob qila qee jaqec nijia eu age cunug dool cus me qee eu fefeig tumatumaoqagan. Ge, dool cus me qee eu wele bilen, qila qee bilina, qa hibna haun cali hugian,” ten.
“Dana oso uqa doc silecca eu uqa cisdu cuhadoiale. Ilo 7-pela eu aluh 7-pela. Aluh euna caja eu bilina. Ilo euha king 7-pela eu odi.
King eundec 5-pela age wele cal mein. Eundec oso uqa qila bilina. Eundec oso uqa qee cali hoc nijia. Uqa humei saen nag odi himec king biligian.
Dool cus me qee eu uqa wele bilen qa qila qee bilel eu uqa king 8-peladoc odi. Uqa king 7-pela eundec oso, uqa limei isi uqana fadalec ugian,” ten.
“Kom 10-pela hina faga eu king 10-pela odi. Age qila king qee bilec nijia. Euqa Anut uqa agena cofadec cabi oc adimei age aua osol dih kingwe dool cus me qee gami cofadi biluqagan.
King 10-pela eundec age cunug agena cisdoc eu osol dih nijigian. Age agena gagadic odocca cofadec cabi occa dool cus me qee utuqagan.
Age Sipsip Nagca cadoqagan qa Sipsip Nagca uqana toodu coboc danaca eu age cacadi wooladoqagan. Sipsip Nag uqana toodu coboc dana eu Anut uqa utaadeceb uqaca hoin, Anut uqa dana cajaca eu nesili cedaden, age uqa gaid toodu cobogina. Sipsip Nag eu uqa tibud cunug agena Tibud, uqa king cunug agena King. Eunu uqa han wooladigian,” ten.
Odocob ensel uqa maten, “Wa mati hina faga euna wal caja uqa bilina eu age dana cajaca dewenega filfilnadecca, dana am filfilnadecca, hatu filfilnadecca, je madec filfilnadecca.
Kom 10-pela faga euca dool cus me qeeca age wal caja eu sagagdoqagan. Age uqana ceteteh cunug cedi hulitumeig bical culdoqagan. Age uqa deweg cunug jimeig jana manecebil qee migian.
Ge, Anut uqa age wawagana cisdoc eu aden. Eunu age wawaga osol Anutna cisdoc toodumeig age agena king bilec cofadec cabi oc eu dool cus me qee utecebil uqa king bibileb li Anutna je mele ihoc ligian.
Caja hina faga eu uqa taun ben eu mahanadec king cunug agena king bilina,” ten.
Eu hedocob ija ensel oso sao jobonnadec nenen fem. Uqa cofadec gagadic odocca. Uqana kobolkobol eu ben bahic, eu maha cunug ileten.
Uqa co suli u utai maden: “Babilon Ben uqa wele fadali toneia! Dana hatu filfilnadec cunug age uqana wain jein, wain eu gagadicca, eu uqana wal kobol odoc. Mahanadec king age uqaca nijein eu odiwe dana uqa wal cajaca nijesina. Mahanadec qaig oc cabi dana age uqana cehewan ocnu gale docna qaig ben bahic oin Eunu uqa wele fadali toneia! Qila buga me qeeca dolonoga filfil me qeeca age ono bilegina. Man fululec filfil gegehinca me qeeca age ono bilegina,” en.
<range>
Odocob ija jejeg oso sao jobonnadec dah mimigin maden: “Uqana silail eu am ben bahic, eu mahanadec saona tecwe. Anut uqa uqana qisol mec odonnu cisdona. Eunu ijana dana cajaca, age uqaca gabandumeig uqaca silail mowainnuca age uqaca gabandumeig uqaca ameg wadacowainnuca age cuculdi cali hoiga!
<range>
Uqa odadenwe eu odi bahic age odudeiga. Uqa me qee odoc cunug odon eu odi age me qee odoc wadacdu lecisdoiga. Wa me qee age jecnu uqa saciadon eu odi age wa me qee wooldu lecisdoc saciadumeig uqana gabinna basecdocobil am beia.
Uqa waugna madena, ‘Ija kwin ene biligina! Ija caja wij qee biligina, culumen ijaca hocob ija qada qee qajigaun!’ ena. Eunu uqa uqadodocnu kobolkobolca cehewanca uten eu odi age waug sogoecca walocca uteiga.
Odocob ceteteh me qee bahic deel osolna dih uqaca cali hugian, eu hag me qeeca, waloc benca, sabnu cahel benca age uqaca cali hugian. Anut Tibud uqana gesiladec eu gagadic bahic. Eunu age jana manudoqagan,” en.
Mahanadec king age caja euca nijein, age uqana cehewan ocnu gale docnu kobol odoin eundec age ja mamanudecebil casuc teteb foqagan saen euna age taun ben eunu qada qajoqagan.
Age uqaca osoben dain me qee ocnu cucuiuqagan. Eunu age onoca bahic tawoqagan. Age odi madoqagan: “O Babilon, hina walocca bahic! Hina culumenca bahic! Hina taun ben bahic, hina taun gagadicca qa aua osolna dih hinana gesildoc gulucdoga,” oqagan.
Odocob oso mahanadec qaig oc cabi dana agena ceteteh fajecnu qee bilel. Eunu age uqanu qada qajoqagan.
Agena golca, silwaca, meen jaca euca, gigilo uqana qaig benca, lotoc me bahicca, lotoc jaca euca, lotoc golca euca, lotoc susumulca euca, na filfil dedeman meca eundecca, ceteh cunug tefulna mudeinca, ceteh cunug eu qaig ohis fajecnu cetehna mudec, eu nana mudecca, eu brasna mudecca, eu ainna mudecca, eu meen susumulcana mudecca eundecca,
mioca, qanaca, ihanec ja casuc dedeman meca euca, lalo dedeman meca euca, sanda meca, wainca, moolca, plauaca, witca, bulmakauca, sipsipca, hosca, karisca, cabi danaca, dana cajaca euha eu cunug oso fajecnu qee bilina.
Qaig oc cabi dana age madoqagan, “Ceteh cunug hina cedecnu wawin hoolena eu qee mi hedoia. Hinana ceteteh me bahicca cehewainca eu qee meia. Hina eundec haun qee gulucadagaun!” doqagan.
Qaig oc cabi dana eu age taun ben euna ceteteh i idadeinna cehewanaga mein eundec age uqaca osoben dain me qee ocnu cucuiuqagan. Eunu age onoca bahic tawoqagan. Age qada qaqaji
madoqagan: “Taun ben eu walocca bahic, eu culumenca bahic! Wele uqa lotoc me bahic, lotoc golca euca taqoloi! Uqa ceteh golna mudec, meen jaca, gigilo uqana qaig benca bala hewoloi!
Aua osolna dih uqana cehewan cunug eu qee mi hedoia!” oqagan. Wag cofdoc dana eu ageca, dana wag fajimeig jobon osonana beleginaca, wagna cabi dana eu ageca dana cunug age macasna cabi oginaca age cunug Babilon onoca bahic tawoqagan.
Age ja mamanebil eu uqana ja casuc ohis teteb fimeig utai madoqagan, “Taun oso taun ben i cinigwe oso qee nijel!” oqagan.
Age bobos ilomogana qeloqagan. Age qada qaqaji madoqagan: “Taun ben i walocca bahic, culumenca bahic! Taun ben i uqana cehewanagana dana cunug age macasna wagna cocobi bileig age cehewanagaca calein. Uqa aua osolna dih uqana ceteteh cunug eu qee meia,” oqagan.
Anut uqa uqana me qee odaden eunu gesildon. Eunu age sao jobonna bilegina eu age uqa fadalennu ceeleigale! Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca, aposelca, je hahun madec dana ageca age ceeleigale!
Odocob ensel gagadic odocca oso meen ben wit wilidoc cinigwe umei macasna qelimei maden: “Eu odiwe age Babilon taun ben hihibanca qelecebil tonigian. Age uqa haun qee fowain.
Hinana qaig oc cabi dana eu gagadicca, eu dana mahana bilegina cunug wooladein. Hina dana cajaca cunug age hatu filfilnadec hinana ceeh jeladecna uhuladem. Age Anutna je hahun madec danaca qagu coboc danaca golanaga taun euna fein. Mele, mahanadec dana cunug age aqein eundec golanaga taun euna fein! Eunu Babilon uqa ameg me qee bahic on. Age hina dunuhna gita jejegca, due silecca, taul fuldocca, cololo fuldocca eundec jejenega haun qee dowain! Cabi doc dana filfil cunug eundec oso age hina dunuhna haun bibilebil qee meciadowain. Wit wilidoc meen uqana jejeg eu hina dunuhna haun qee dah mowain. Gowocna iletec eu hina dunuhna haun qee ileteceb fowain. Dana cajaca age ocobocobegina eu age jejenega hina dunuhna haun qee dah mowain,” en.
<range>
<range>
Eu hedocob ija dana cajaca am ben bahic sao jobonna bilegina jejenega benwe dah mimigin age madein: “Ege Anut binan suluquna! Egena Anut uqa cahahagena! Uqa kobolkobolca bahic! Uqa gagadic odocca bahic!
Uqana gesilec eu mele bahic, eu tutuc bahic! Wal caja ben eu uqa dana cajaca mahana bilegina eu age uqana wal kobol odocna jic siho qu ihacadoloi eu Anut uqa gesildoia. Uqa Anutna cewel oc dana aqeceb cal mein eunu Anut uqa ameg wadacdoia,” ein.
Age haun utai madein, “Ege Anut binan suluquna! Ja taun ben eu maneceb eu uqana casuc gaid ohis teceb catanena!” ein.
Dana matu 24ca ceteh cebac 4-pelaca age toni mahuli cosolimeig Anut uqa king bilec cabalna bilina eunu cuha fein. Age madein: “Mele bahic! Ege Anut binan suluquna!” ein.
Odocob king bilec cabalnadec jejeg oso maden: “Anutna cewel utoc dana cunug egena Anutnu binan suleigale! Dana cajaca cunug age ijanagaca, age ijanagaca qee eundecca, cunug age Anutnu cumunegina eu age egena Anutnu binan suleigale!” en.
Odocob ija dana cajaca am ben bahic jejenega cinigwe dah mem, eu wa mati busali buhohdonawe, qeli ben qonawe odi dah mem. Age odi mamadegin dah mem: “Tibud, egena Anut gagadic odocca eu uqa king bilina! Eunu ege Anut binan suluquna!
Sipsip Nag caja ugiannu deel wele cali hoia. Uqana caja eu jauni hedoia, saciadoia bilia. Anut uqa lotoc soidoc walelecca tacigiannu utia. Eunu ege ceeli bileceb celeboeqale! Ege uqa binan suluqale!” ein. (Lotoc me bahic eu Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca agena tutuc odoc.)
<range>
Odocob ensel eu ija maten, “Je i jaqaga. Dana cajaca Anut age Sipsip Nag caja ocob sab ben jecna loqagannu utaaden eu age ceelec bilegina,” ten. Odocob ensel eu haun maten, “Je i eu Anutna je mele bahic,” ten.
Odocob ija uqa jaihna toni mahuli cosolimig uqanu cuha fecnu odom qa uqa maten, “Cain odogaun! Ija cewel oc dana gami hinaca, hina wawaga meleec cotinelca, cunug age mele je Jisas qasali maaden eu hewegina eu age ija cabi hijiga. Eunu hina Anutnu dih cuha faga!” ten. Ge, mele je Jisas qasali maaden eu me je uqana gug eu Kis Anut uqa je hahun madec dana adeceb age me je qasali maadein.
Odocob ija feciimig sao jobon hudeceb ija ono hos senenecca fem! Oso uqa hos eu tatacan bilen eu Anutna je cunug gaid qasali maadena egina, eu mele bahic egina. Uqa tutuc odocna gesiladena, uqa tutuc odocna han cadena.
Uqa ameg eu ja belicanwe, uqa ilona king katakat mati gulodona. Uqa dewegna ijan oso jaqec taweia oso uqa ijan eu qee dona, uqa dih dona.
Lotoc cecelac taqen eu golac u men. Uqa ijan eu, “Anutna Je.”
Sao jobonnadec han dana am age uqa toodoin. Age lotoc soidoc senenec tataqeig hos senenec tatacan bibili cobogina.
Uqa conadec han sigin aigca cali hon. Uqa euna dana hatu filfilnadec hannu wooladigian. “Uqa agena king bilec age ain komna gagadic odocca cofadigian,” en. Uqa wain Anut gagadic odocca uqana gemag jawe bec eu uqana wain aig afdoc cudun benna lahacdocob basecdugian.
Uqana lotoc cecelacnaca uqa tucuhnaca ijan jaqec eu: “KING CUNUG AGENA KING, TIBUD CUNUG AGENA TIBUD,” en.
Odocob ija ensel camna tatawen fem. Uqa co suli u man fululec cunug sao ohisna fululi cocobogin utai maaden, “Age hu Anutna sab jec benna osoben ceguleigale!
Age humeig dana cal mec cuhunuga jeigale! Age king dewenegaca, han dana agena ilo ben dewenegaca, han dana dewenegaca, agena hos dewenegaca, dana hos tatacan bilegina eu dewenegaca, dana besiadec bileginaca dana qee besiadec bileginaca eundec dewenegaca, dana ijanagaca dana ijanagaca qee eundec dewenegaca, dana caja cunug dewenegaca eu cuhunuga cunug jeigale!” aden.
Odocob ija dool cus me qeeca, mahanadec kingca, agena han dana amamca age humeig oso hos tatacan bilinaca, uqana han dana amca han cadecnu gami gabandoin eu fem.
Odocob uqa dool cus me qeeca uhulec je hahun madec danaca hewalen. Uhulec je madec dana uqa dool cus me qee amegna kobolkobol uhulec eu odon. Uqa kobolkobol uhulec euna dana cajaca age dool cus me qee uqana gaga oin, dana cajaca age dool cus me qee ihiconnu cuha foloig eu age qauaden. Odocob uqa dool cus me qeeca, uhulec je hahun madec danaca osoben helaleceb ale wa gudoc benwe eu jaca ja meen jan dainca cijina euna cebac bilesina nosin.
Odocob oso uqa hos tatacan bilina uqa han sigin uqa conadec cali hona uqa euna alena han dana amam aqeceb cal mein. Odocob man fululec cunug age cuhunuga jejegin wawaga ihoc len.
Odocob ija ensel oso sao jobonnadec nenen fem, uqa ebenna maha heel ben eu dunuh bahic non gugca qee eu uqana kica, sen teehugca hewen.
Uqa man sononec ben eu hewi calawandu cilehdon. Eu man sononec weledec bahic, eu Fadalec Dana, eu Seten. Odimei ensel eu uqa sen euna libimei qeludeceb maha heel ben eu dunuh bahic non gugca qee euna non. Uqa cabi gel 1,000 odi bilen.
Odocob uqa dana hatuhatu filfilnadec haun qee qauadeiaun, leceb cabi gel 1,000 eu hedugiannu uqa kina jic tatacan menimei uqa jic gagadic bahic cufa qon. Eu hedocob saen gohic dih cobigiannu cufaldugian.
Ija king bilec cabal leih bibilegin fem. Dana leih euna bilein eu age Anut uqa gesiladecnu gagadic odoc aden. Dana dolonoga leihha fem. Dana eundec age Jisasnu jeca, Anutna me jeca qasali maadein eunu age benega cagocobil cal mein. Age dool cus me qeeca, uqa ihiconca eunu cuha qee felein. Age ilomoga domonnafo, ebeneganafo dool cus me qee uqana gaga qee oloin. Age haun cebac caji bilecebil age Kraisca cabi gel 1,000 odi king bilein.
I eu dana cal mecnadec ceseli cajec osahicdoc. Dana leih cal mein eu age qee cebac caji bilelein leceb cabi gel 1,000 hedon.
Dana age cal mecnadec ceseli cajec osahicdocna ceseli cajoqagan eundec age Anut uqa eeladeceb age gun biluqagan. Cal mec lecisdoc eu cilehadecnu gagadicca qee. Euqa age egena Anutnaca Kraisnaca nawel tawec ihanec dana biluqagan. Age Kraisca cabi gel 1,000 king biluqagan.
Cabi gel 1,000 hedocob Anut uqa Seten gihacdoc cudunnadec cufaldugian.
Odocob uqa dana hatuhatu filfilnadec age mahana cunug biluqagan eu qauadecnu nuigian. Dana eundec age Gog Magogca oqagan. Seten uqa han cadecnu gabanadigian. Dana age han cadecnu gabandoqagan eu mati bahic, eu odi esic macas lanna tawenawe.
Age hatu cunug filiganadimeig age taun Anut nalug mena, ono Anutna qagu coboc dana cajaca age bilegina eu talildoin. Euqa ja sao jobonnadec toni cijaden.
Odocob Seten, uqa qauaden eu, heludecebil wa gudoc benwe eu jaca ja meen jan dainca cijina euna non, ono dool cus me qeeca, uhulec je madec danaca helalecebil nosin. Age ono witic cahinegca gaidgaid dain ben aadeb sogoi bilecebil catanena.
Odocob ija king bilec cabal senenec benca oso uqa euna bilinaca eu fem. Maha saoca ale uqa cemenugdec busali belesin. Age haun qee fecialowain.
Odocob ija dana cal mec feciadem. Dana ijanagaca, dana ijanagaca qee agecaca king bilec cabal amegna tawein. Ensel eu age buk leih cosocdoin. Odocob buk osoha cosocdoin, eu cebac bilec agena buk. Cal mec dana eu agena odoc, eu odi buk leih euna jaqein euna odi gesiladen.
Odocob macas uqana cal mec dana culaden. Cal mecca dol jobonca alena cal mec dana age ono bilein eu culadesin. Cal mec dana cunug eu agena odoc euna odi gesiladen.
Odocob cal mecca dol jobonca helalecebil wa gudoc benwe jaca cijina euna nosin. Wa gudoc benwe jaca cijina eu cal mec lecisdoc.
Oso uqa ijan eu cebac bilec buk euna qee jaqelein eu age heludecebil wa gudoc benwe jaca cijina euna non.
Odocob ija sao haun maha haunca fem. Ge, sao weledec maha weledecca qee mi hedosin. Macas ha qee mi hedon.
Odocob ija taun gun ben fem, eu Jerusalem haun, eu Anut odocob sao jobonnadec toni nen. Eu saciadu hedoc bilia, caja uqa dana ocnu bala falimei gemug sumudinawe.
Odocob ija king bilec cabalnadec jejeg ben oso mamaden dah mem, “Qila Anutna jobon eu dana gemo bilia! Uqa ageca biluqagan. Odocob age uqana dana cajaca biluqagan. Anut uqadodoc age gami biluqagan. Uqa agena Anut biligian.
Uqa amaganadec amulunuga cunugca cacuadigian. Ceteh weledec eu cunug qee mi hedon. Eunu ono dana haun qee cal mowain, age walocca haun qee biluwain, age haun qee qajowain, age haun dain adecnu qee owain,” en.
Odocob oso uqa king bilec cabalna bilina eu maden, “Qila ija ceteh cunug haun ifaniga!” en. Uqa ijaha haun odi maten, “Je i mele bahic, odocob dana cunug age je inu wawaga meleigiannu ihoc. Eunu je i jaqaga,” ten.
Odocob uqa maden, “Ceteh cunug eu wele hedoia! Ija aqunec, ija cit qoc. Ija sanan mec, ija hedoc. Dana oso wa gab cagudocob eu ija uqa wa cebac fifiji benanadec wa fajecca qee jecnu cois docomin jigian.
Oso uqa gagadic mimi han wooldona eu ceteteh cunug eu ijanadec muguh ugian. Ija uqana Anut biligen, uqa ija melami biligian,” en.
“Euqa dana cucuiimeig bicbic beleginaca, dana wawaga qee meleena euca, dana kobol gegehinca odoginaca, dana age dana aqeginaca, dana wal cajaca nijeginaca, dana ceeh jeladeginaca, dana kadan tibudnu cuha feginaca, dana cunug uhulec je madeginaca eundec agena cudun eu wa gudoc benwe eu jaca ja meen jan dainca cijina agena. Cudun eu cal mec lecisdoc,” en.
Odocob ensel 7-pela age boh 7-pela eu dana cajaca me qee madecnu ceteh 7-pela am ben eu hewein eundec oso humei maten, “Hoga. Ija caja dana oc ihachigen, eu Sipsip Nag aideg,” ten.
Odocob Kisca ija hewiti ibulteceb ensel eu gahiti aluh ben oso ohis bahic igocna ehi ti miten. Uqa Jerusalem ihacten. Eu taun gun, Anut odocob sao jobonnadec toni nenen fem.
Eu Anutna kobolkobolca waleli nen. Taun ben eu meen uqana qaig ohisca jaspa cinigwe walelen. Eu camasac bahic, eu glas cinigwe.
Taun ben eu gel cecelac ohisca. Gel eu jic cebec 12-pela tawen. Ensel 12-pela age jic cebec eu cofdudu tawegina. Jic cebec filfilna eu Isrel dana cajaca agena sihul 12-pela eu age ijanaga jaqijaqi qelein.
Jic cebec cijed eu gel qeih 4-pela cunugna tawein. Cijed eu cam tobi benana isec tawein, cijed eu notna isec tawein, cijed eu sautna isec tawein, cijed eu cam toni nonana isec tawein.
Taun ben eu uqana gel eu meen big gug 12-pelana cehein. Meen big gug euna Sipsip Nagna aposel 12-pela eu age ijanaga jaqein.
Ensel uqa ija maten eu ihoc mecnu na tutuc goldna mudec hewen. Uqa ihoc mec na euna taun ben eu bagalan ganicca, cecelac ganicca, ohis ganicca ihoc mi figiannu. Uqa taun benna cebecca, gelca ihoc mi figiannu.
Taun ben eu tutuc bahic tawen. Uqana cecelac uqana bagalanca eu ihocihoc. Ensel taun ben eu ganic docnu ihoc men. Uqana cecelac eu 2,200 kilomita. Uqana bagalan eu uqana cecelac ihocihoc. Uqana ohis eu uqana cecelac ihocihoc.
Ensel uqaha gel uqana teehug eu ganic docnu ihoc men. Uqana teehug eu 144 mita. Sanijec mita i ensel uqa ihoc men eu dana cunug mita eu odi ihoc megina.
Gel eu meen jaspana mudein. Taun ben uqadodoc eu gold soidoc bahic euna mudein, eu camasac bahic eu glas cinigwe.
Taun ben uqana gel uqana meen big gug eu meen qaig ohisna fajecnu filfil euna bala faldoin. Meen big gug osahicdoc eu meen jaspa, meen big gug lecisdoc eu meen sapaia, eu meen gaga cadibca, meen big gug cijeddoc eu meen aget, meen big gug 4-peladoc eu meen emeral, eu meen gaga na bagacca,
meen big gug 5-peladoc eu sadonikis, eu meen gaga gol jedocca, meen big gug 6-peladoc eu meen konilian, eu meen gaga golca, meen big gug 7-peladoc eu meen krisolait, eu meen gaga janca, meen big gug 8-peladoc eu meen beril, eu meen gaga na bagacca, meen big gug 9-peladoc eu meen topas, eu meen gaga janca, meen big gug 10-peladoc eu meen krispres, meen big gug 11-peladoc eu meen haiasin, meen big gug 12-peladoc eu meen ametis, eu meen gaga golca.
Jic cebec 12-pela eu gilolo senenec 12-pela, eu fajecnu qaig eu ohis. Jic cebec abesabes eu gilolo osolna mudein. Taun benna jic cunug eu gold soidoc bahicna mudein, eu camasac bahic glas cinigwe.
Ija tempel oso taun ben dunuh qee felem. Ge, uqana tempel eu Anut Tibud gagadic odocca Sipsip Nagca.
Taun ben eu camfo, jagelfo fulacdocnu qee nijel. Ge, Anutna kobolkobol eu uqana fulacdona. Sipsip Nag eu uqana gowoc.
Dana cajaca hatu filfilnadec age fulacdoc euna coboqagan. Odocob mahanadec king age agena cehewanaga cedi ahu dunuh loqagan.
Deel cunug taun benna jic cebec eu age hudi qelec tawigian. Age qee menecebil taweiaun. Odocob ono witic qee nijiaun.
Hatuhatu filfil age agena ceteteh me bahicca cehewanagaca taun ben dunuh cedi loqagan.
Euqa ceteh gegehinca oso taun ben dunuh qee leiaun. Dana oso majagca odonaca, uqa uhulec je madenaca taun ben dunuh qee leiaun. Dana age ijanaga Sipsip Nagna cebac bilec bukna jaqein eu age dih taun ben eu dunuh loqagan.
Ensel eu cebac bilec wa ihacten, eu glas cinigwe fililaen. Wa eu Anutnaca Sipsip Nagnaca king bilec cabalnadecca cali hona.
Eu taun benna jic gemo odi guguli nuina. Wa gesac nahanaha cebac bilec na tawena. Eu cabi gel osolna saen 12-pelana aig qona, jagel osolna saen osol aig qona. Uqana bagac eu dana cajaca hatuhatu filfilnadec me madigiannu.
Ceteh oso Anut uqa geulden eu taun ben eu dunuh qee fowain. Anutnaca Sipsip Nagnaca king bilec cabal eu taun ben dunuh biligian. Uqana cewel oc dana uqanu cuha foqagan.
Age uqa ola foqagan. Uqa ijan age ilomoga domonna jaqigian.
Anut Tibud uqa agena fulacdoc biligian. Eunu ono witic haun qee meiaun, age gowocca camca alena fulacdocna fecnu qee nijiaun. Odocob age king bilecebil catanigian.
Odocob ensel eu maten, “Je i eu mele bahic, age je inu wawaga meleecnu ihoc. Anut Tibud uqa uqana Kis je hahun madec dana aden eu uqa uqana ensel uqana cewel oc dana cajaca cel ceteh isi caligian ec ihacadigiannu suldon,” ten.
Odocob Jisas maden, “Faga! Ija mahuc odi hugen!” ten. Eu age je hahun jaqec eu buk ina nijia eu toodu cobogina eundec age ceelec bileigale!
Ija, Jon, ceteh i cunug ija fifi dudu em. Ija eu fifi dudu i hedumig ensel uqa ceteh i ihacten eu ija uqanu cuha fecnu jaihna toni mahuli cosolem.
Euqa uqa maten, “Eu odi cain odogaun! Ija hinana cewel oc dana hijen oso, ijaha wawaga meleec cotogail eu age je hahun madec dana eu hijiga oso, ijaha cunug je buk ina nijia eu toodu cobogina eu hijiga oso. Anutnu himec cuha faga!” ten.
Odocob uqa haun maten, “Saen ceteh i caligian eu cemenug nijia. Eunu je hahun jaqec eu buk ina nijia cain jahuni hewagaun.
Oso uqa qisol mec odona eu uqa gaid odi qisol mec odeiale. Oso uqa gegehinca bilina eu uqa gaid odi gegehinca biliale. Oso uqa me odona eu uqa gaid odi me odeiale. Oso uqa gun bilina eu uqa gaid odi gun biliale,” ten.
Odocob Jisas maden, “Faga! Ija mahuc odi hugen! Ija ijana ameg adec ahugen, eu ija cunug agena odocna odi abesabes adigen.
Ija aqunec, ija cit qoc. Ija sanan mec, ija hedoc,” en.
Age agena lotoc cusecebil soidoc nijigian eu ceelec bileigale. Age eu odocobilfi age cebac bilec na eunadec aig u joqagannu cois adigian. Age taun benna jic cebec gemo loqagannu ihoc.
Euqa taun ben hahagum eu dana me qee age qa cinigwe ono bilein. Dana eundec age gegehin odoc odogina, age ceeh jeladegina, age wal cajaca nijegina, age dana aqegina, age kadan tibudnu cuha fegina, age uhulec je madecnu gawegina, odocob age qauadegina.
“Ija Jisas, ijana ensel uqa ceteh i age tamanec agena cuha jonana bilegina eu je qasali maadecnu suldom. Ija Dewid sihulnadec mel. Ija malaqa boei fulacdocca eu,” en.
Kisca caja dana occa ale Jisas madosina, “Hina hoga!” dosina. Cunug age je i dah megina eu ageha madoqagan, “Hina hoga!” doqagan. Oso uqa wa gab dona eu humei jeiale. Oso uqa cebac bilec wa eu fajecca qee ocnu gale dona eu oiale.
Ija cunug age je hahun jaqec eu buk ina nijia eu dah megina eu ija je gagadicca ulauladigina. Oso uqa je ina je oso tubdocobfi Anut uqa uqana ameg euna ceteh me qee odoc buk ina nijia eu tubdugian.
Oso uqa je hahun jaqec eu buk ina nijia euna je oso u helecebfi Anut uqa uqana cebac bilec na aig muguh mecca taun ben gun muguh mecca, eunu je buk ina nijia, eu u heligian.
Oso uqa ceteh i cunugnu je qasali maadena eu uqa qila madena, “Eu mele bahic! Ija mahuc odi hugen!” ena. Eu mele bilina. Jisas Tibud, hina hogale!
Jisas Tibud uqana eelgec uum igec eu age cunugca biliale. Eu mele.
